K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:362b-0: a'arya bidy'a autta ma mah'a @362b tantra; bod skad du /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:362b-1: 'phags pa rig pa mchog gi rgyud chen po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:362b-2: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:362b-3: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na; bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:362b-4: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje rig pa bye ba phrag du mas bskor nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bar snang las babs te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:362b-5: de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kyang rig pa bye ba du mas yongs su bskor nas 'khor de nyid du 'dus te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:362b-6: de nas 'byung po'i bdag po dbang ldan 'byung po bye ba phrag du mas bskor nas 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:362b-7: phyag na rdo rje la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:362b-8: de nas gdol pa'i rgyal po phur bu gsum pa yang 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:363a-1: bzhi yang g-yog 'khor bye ba phrag du mas kun nas bskor te 'khor de nyid du 'dus nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:363a-2: de nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:363a-4: sems can thams cad kyi don gyi slang du bdag gsang sngags kyi tshig 'chad par gnang ba mdzad du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:363a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:363a-6: lag na rdo rje; khyod ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:363a-10: shin tu brtsam pa med pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:363a-11: shin tu gtum pa yin na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:363a-12: ji ltar sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir gsang sngags 'chang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:363a-15: dam tshig shes pa yin la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:363a-16: sems can gang dag dam tshig mi shes par brjod pa rnams ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:363a-17: rdo rjes mthar byed pa yin na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:363a-21: de de lta lags mod kyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:363a-23: gang dag rig pa mchog 'di'i don 'don pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:363b-0: @363b mchod pa bgyis pa de dag ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:363b-1: bdag gi dam tshig 'tshal ba lags /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:363b-2: bdag gi dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa lags pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:363b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang bar mdzad du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:363b-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnod sbyin gyi bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:363b-6: bdag gi yi ge bzhi pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:363b-7: rig pa'i tshogs thams cad kyi snying por gyur pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:363b-8: las mang po rab tu sgrub pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:363b-9: stobs dang pha rol gnon pa dpag tu ma mchis pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:363b-10: bstan pa thogs pa ma mchis pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:363b-11: bcom ldan 'das rig pa'i rgyal po bshad par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:363b-14: chu la gnas pa'i 'byung po'i tshogs rnams /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:363b-15: khyed yid rtse gcig tu gyis la nyon cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:363b-16: rdo rjes mgo bkas par gyur ta re /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:363b-17: de nas lag na rdo rjes rang gi rig pa'i tshogs la bltas nas gsang sngags smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:363b-18: na mo ratna tra ya sya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:363b-19: na mashtsanda badzra p'a ni sya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:363b-20: ma h'a yaksha se n'a pa ti sya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:363b-21: ma h'a sh'akya sam buddh'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:363b-26: bidyu ta ta ma yartsi ni mi li sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:363b-27: de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de 'dar yed yed nas thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:363b-29: bdag cag la bskyab tu gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:363b-31: bdag cag la bskyab tu gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:364a-0: de nas gnod sbyin gyi dbang po lag @364a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:364a-1: na rdo rjes thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la grogs po dag ma 'jigs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:364a-3: rig pa'i rgyal po dran par gyis shig ces dbugs phyung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:364a-4: de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ngo mtshar du gyur nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:364a-6: byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje 'di lta bu'i gsang sngags kyi tshig dag 'chad pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:364a-10: rig pa'i rgyal po gang na gnas pa der mchod par 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:364a-13: sgrub pa'i rig sngags 'chang de'i brtson pa bskyed par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:364a-18: de nas rig pa'i rgyal po'i las ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:364a-22: chu la lan gcig brjod pas srung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:364a-24: mtshon rnon po la lan gnyis brjod de rtsva ku sha bcad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:364a-26: de ltar na rig sngags thams cad bcad par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:364a-29: mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mdun du mchod pa bgyis la rig sngags gang yi ge ma tshang pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:364b-0: dran pa nyams pa @364b de lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod de rig pa'i mchog gi snying po dang lhan cig tu lan gsum brjod na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:364b-2: ci ste las bcang par gyur na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:364b-3: rtsva ku shas byab par bya ste; rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:364b-4: lag na rdo rje'i mdun du lan bzhi brjod na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:364b-5: dge ba dang mi dge ba ston par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:364b-6: ci 'dod pa yid bzhin du sbyor ba bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:364b-11: dur khrod kyi sol bas bsnun no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:364b-12: yang na gzugs bgyis te lcug mas bzhus na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:364b-14: yang na sa la gzugs bgyis te dur khrod kyi sol bas lag mthil la rdo rje bris te lag pas bkab na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:364b-16: skud pa la mdud pa bor ba rnams kyis rig sngags bcing ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:364b-17: mkha' 'gro ma rnams bcad par bgyi na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:364b-18: yungs kar dag la lan bdun bdun bsngags te bsnun na mkha' 'gro ma thams cad ma rungs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:364b-21: yang na tsandan dmar pos dkyil 'khor byugs la rdo rje rtse lnga pa bris te gu gul gyis bdug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:364b-22: me tog rnams kyis dbab bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:364b-26: so phag gi dum bu rnams kyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:365a-6: mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi nas lag na rdo rje'i mdun du zhag gsum smyung bar byas la brgyad stong bzlas brjod bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:365a-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rjes dam pa stsol bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:365a-8: de'i 'og tu dug gso ba la sogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:365a-10: gal te mkha' 'gro ma rnams shin tu bcad par 'tshal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:365a-11: de nas lag na rdo rje'i mdun du 'bras kyi zegs mas lan brgya stong sbyin sreg bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:365a-12: lag na rdo rjes ji skad bshad pa bzhin du tshe ji tsam thub par rig sngags thams cad ma rungs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:365a-13: seng ldeng gi rdo rje bgyis te rig sngags 'chang gi ming nas brjod la sa la lan gcig btsugs na bshig par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:365a-14: de phyin chad rig sngags 'chang de'i gsang sngags rnams mi 'jug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:365a-15: rig sngags gcad par bgyi 'tshal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:365a-16: rig sngags 'chang gi gzugs bgyis pa bcad na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:365a-18: rig sngags bshig par bgyid 'tshal bas rig sngags de rig pa mchog gi snying po dang lhan cig brjod na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:365a-19: rig sngags thams cad bshig par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:365b-0: rig pa 'gugs par 'tshal bas mar gyi @365b ngo zhag brgyad la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis la lag na rdo rje'i mdun du mchod par bgyis te rig pa mchog gi snying po dang lhan cig lan brgya stong bzlas brjod bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:365b-3: rig pa nyams par bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:365b-4: bzlas brjod byas pas cho ga ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:365b-5: che ge mo'i rig pa la gnod pa mdzod cig ces bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:365b-6: rig pa de las mi bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:365b-7: rig pa tshar gcad par bgyi na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:365b-8: thal ba la gzugs bgyi ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:365b-9: rig pa mchog gi snying po dang lhan cig brjod la rkang pa g-yon pas kyang phyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:365b-13: gal te rig sngags 'chang gzhig par 'tshal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:365b-14: lag na rdo rje'i mdun du rig sngags 'chang gi ming nas brjod de mar me'i snying po me lce dang bcas pa bdun sbyin sreg bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:365b-15: rig sngags 'chang ba bshig par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:365b-18: rig sngags 'chang de'i tshe ji tsam par gsang sngags rnams mi 'grub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:365b-20: ma la ta'i me tog mar la smyugs pa'i sbyin sreg bgyi ba lan nyi shu rtsa gcig lag na rdo rje'i mdun du sbyin sreg bgyi na rig pa 'grub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:366a-0: ri la 'dzegs te kha zas 'o skyo 'thung zhing @366a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:366a-1: lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyis na rig pa'i rgyal po'i mchog rang gi gzugs su mthong bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:366a-2: de la bu ci bya zhes gsung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:366a-4: las thams cad mdzad du gsol zhes brjod par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:366a-5: de bzhin du gyur cig ces brjod nas mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:366a-6: de nas yid kyis bzlas brjod bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:366a-8: grog mkhar gyi sa las sbrul bgyis te sngags kyis btab na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:366a-10: dbang du yang 'gyur ro; ;gsag ma la lan bdun bsngags te mtshor bor na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:366a-13: 'bab chu chen po skam par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:366a-14: gang du bor ba de skam par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:366a-15: bdag gi rig pa'i rgyal po 'di ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:366a-16: rig pa'i rgyal po thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:366a-17: rig pa thams cad kyi mchog tu brjod pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:366a-18: gal te rig pa gzhan dag gi las mi 'tshal na yang sbyor ba 'dis rig pa thams cad sbyor bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:366a-21: rig pa'i rgyal po lhan cig lan gsum brjod la 'ga' zhig ma mchis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:366a-22: de'i mgo dum bu zhim thig le'i snyi ma bzhin du 'gas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:366b-0: gang gi tshe gsang ba pa rnams kyi gsang sngags @366b grub pa de'i tshe las thams cad du rig pa'i mchog bzlas brjod bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:366b-1: mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis te lag na rdo rje'i mdun du mchod pa bgyis la ba smad spu mthun gyi mar gsar blangs te mar gsar des seng ldeng gi mer lan brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:366b-2: rig pa'i mchog rig pa sgrub pa rnams la dam pa stsol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:366b-3: gang gi tshe pha rol 'bros par bgyid 'tshal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:366b-4: phub ma las lan brgya stong sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:366b-7: mar gyi nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis te lag na rdo rje'i mdun du aarga'i zhugs bus la rtsva dur ba'i lo ma lan brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:366b-8: ti na ra gcig rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:366b-9: mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi nas zhag gsum smyung ba bgyis te lag na rdo rje'i mdun du me tog ku mu da dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:366b-12: mar la smyugs pa khri me'i nang du sbyin sreg bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:366b-16: ldong ros rnams cha bsnyams te rma bya'i mkhris pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:366b-17: ril bu sran ma tsam du bgyis te lag na rdo rje'i mdun du rig pa'i mchog lan brgyad stong bzlas brjod bgyis la sbrul gyis zin pa la chu la btang na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:367a-2: 'bras phreng bar gyur pa la chab bskol ba las gtang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:367a-3: sbrum ma bu ma phyin pa la ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:367a-4: mar las btang na bde bar btsa' bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:367a-5: byis pa gdon gyis zin na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:367a-6: bdug pas bdugs pas gtong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:367a-7: bud med kyi nad la ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:367a-9: phug tu 'jug na; lus la bsku'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:367a-10: sgrub pa na bdag la bdugs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:367a-11: log 'dren thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:367a-12: lag na rdo rje'i mdun du srad bu la rig pa'i mchog brgyad stong bzlas brjod bgyis te lag pa la btags nas g-yul ngor zhugs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:367a-13: pha rol gyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:367a-14: sbyin sreg bgyis pa'i thal ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:367a-15: thal ba gtsang mas kham phor bkang la rig pa mchog bzlas brjod bgyid na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:367a-16: rkun po gang na 'dug pa der mchi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:367a-17: gang gis rig pa'i rgyal po 'di yid kyis bzlas brjod bgyis pa de la dbang phyug chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:367a-18: dbang phyug chen po'i tshogs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:367a-31: lag na rdo rje'i phyag brnyan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:367a-32: gang gis kyang glags mi rnyed kyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:367b-0: lag @367b na rdo rje'i de'i mgo 'gems so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:367b-2: phyogs gtsang mar mchod pa bgyis te rtsva ku sha'i mdung rtse gsum pa thogs la yungs kar zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:367b-4: mar bsregs pa sbyin blugs lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg bgyi zhing nyin bdun dus gsum du gcer bus skra bshig la bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:367b-6: mar gyi ngo zhag drug nas brtsams te mtsho 'gram du mchis la mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad pa'i bar du yungs kar dag las sbyin sreg lan brgya stong bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:367b-9: 'phags pa rig pa'i rgyal po'i mchog sgrub pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:367b-10: ri mo mkhan gso sbyong bzung bas ma gong pa'i ras la spyin dang ma 'dres pa'i tshon rtsi rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs bri bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:367b-11: g-yas phyogs su lag na rdo rje stan nang tshangs can gyi steng na mchis par bri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:367b-12: lag na rdo rje'i 'og tu rig pa'i mchog bri'o; ;bcom ldan 'das ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:367b-13: gser gyi kha dog lta bu'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:367b-16: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:367b-17: rig pa'i rgyal po yang sngo bsangs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:367b-18: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan la stan gor bu'i steng na mchis par bri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:368a-0: mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis te ci nus su mchod par bgyis la rgyal @368a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:368a-1: pa'i blo gros kyis rig pa'i rgyal po dgug par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:368a-2: rdo rje'i khas nye reg bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:368a-3: rdo rje'i lte bas spos dbul bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:368a-4: me kha las me tog dbul bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:368a-5: gdong dkar gyis bsrung bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:368a-6: rdo rje sor mos khrus bgyi'o //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:378a-11: de cho ga rgyas pa las 'byung ba'i las thams cad dngos grub tu 'gyur ro; ;gal te des las grub par ma gyur na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:378a-12: de'i 'og tu las 'di bsgrubs na dngos grub kyi mchog tu 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:378a-13: yar gyi ngo nya nas bzung ste phyi ma'i nya'i bar du mi smra pa'i brtul zhugs kyis zas su 'o skyo 'thung zhing de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdun du 'bum bzlas brjod bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:378a-14: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs 'gul bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:378a-15: de nas cho ga rgyas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:378b-0: ras sngon po la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te 'og sgor bcings la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg @378b bgyis pa'i thal bas mgo bor srung bar bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:378b-1: gyad phar non cing gyad kyis tshur mi non no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:378b-3: bra ma'i khu ba mar dang cha bsnyams la mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis te lag na rdo rje'o mdun du lan brgyad stong bzlas brjod bgyis pa 'thungs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:378b-5: yar gyi ngo tshes zhag gcig nas brtsams te lag na rdo rje'i mdun du mar dang 'o ma bsres pa las lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis pa 'thungs shing zhag bdun bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:378b-7: yar gyi ngo nya la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis te lag na rdo rje'i mdun du aang go ta'i me tog brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:378b-8: nyi ma gsum pa la thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:378b-9: zhag bdun na lag na rdo rje'i kha nas 'od zer 'byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:378b-10: rig sngags 'chang la bskor ba byas nas gyen du 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:378b-11: rig sngags 'chang ji ltar 'dod pa'i gzugs can du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:378b-12: lo sum stong thub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:378b-13: mar gyi ngo zhag bcu la lag na rdo rje'i mdun du sna ma'i me tog brgyad stong phul na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:378b-15: cho ga rgyas pa sgrub pa pos nya dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:378b-22: shing thog rnams bza' bar mi bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:379a-1: 'di dag kyang zos la las kyang bsgrubs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:379a-2: lag na rdo rje'i de nyid mthar byed cing las kyang dngos grub tu mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:379a-4: mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la grog mkhar rtse mo yod pa'i mdun nas sa blangs te ba'i rnam lnga dang bsres la seng+ge'i gzugs bgyis te gso sbyong bzung la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:379a-5: zla ba gcig zas su 'o skyo 'thung zhing tha mar zhag gsum smyung ba bgyis te mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la bsgrub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:379a-6: sngar po nya mo rnams kyis las rnams bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:379a-7: bsnyen bskur bgyis pa rnams kyang bsrung bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:379a-8: de nas lag na rdo rje'i mdun du bzlas brjod bgyis te seng+ge'i sgra 'byin gyi bar du bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:379a-9: seng+ge'i sgra thos nas lha ma yin gyi bu mo rnams 'byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:379a-10: de dag la 'dod pa bskyed par mi bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:379a-14: lha ma yin gyi bu rnams ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:379a-16: lha ma yin rnams kyang yongs su spyad par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:379a-17: gal te de dag la 'dod pa ma bskyed na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:379a-19: seng+ge la zhon nas rig sngags 'chang gi bu mo brgyad cu 'byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:379a-20: rig sngags 'chang bzhi stong yang g-yog 'khor du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:379a-22: rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:379a-23: 'khor lo la sogs pa'i spyod yul du mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:379b-0: gang gi tshe @379b rdo rje dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:379b-6: dbyug to rnams mchi ba de'i che seng+ges seng+ga'i sgra 'byin te seng+ge'i sgras mtshon pa thams cad dpag tshad brgyad khrir mchi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:379b-7: rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po gang dag seng+ge'i sgra thos pa de dag thams cad sa la lhung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:379b-8: mtshon chad dag thams cad kyang dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:379b-9: bskal par gnas pa'i rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:379b-10: mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la nyin zhag gcig smyang ba bgyis te ba'i lci ba sa la ma lhung ba blangs te skam sa gtsang ma'i phyogs su gnod sbyin gyi gzugs bgyis te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:379b-11: de la me tog dmar po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:379b-12: gtor ma dmar po sbyin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:379b-13: pho nya mo rnams kyis las thams cad bgyi'o; ;phyogs gcig tu gnod sbyin thams cad la me kha las me tog dkar po rnams stsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:379b-14: gzugs de'i mdun du aarga'i shing gi zhugs bus la shing bil ba'i yam sreg shing zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:379b-16: mar la smyugs pa brgyad stong sbyin srag bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:379b-17: de nas gzugs 'gul zhing dngos grub tu 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:379b-18: nyin re ti na ra re re dbul lo; ;dpon g-yog bdun gyi zas dbul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:380a-0: las 'di bsam par bgyis te gtsang mar bgyis la lan gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te ba nag mo ma smad spu mthun gyi 'o ma @380a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:380a-1: blangs la bram ze'i bu mos bsrubs pa'i mar blangs te mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la zhag gsum du smyung ba bgyis te mtshan gcig yod pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:380a-2: lag na rdo rje'i khyim du song la shing aa shvattha'i lo ma bdun blangs te de dag gi steng du gnod sbyin gyi gzugs mthe bong gi cha tsam zhig bgyi ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:380a-3: de nas 'gul gyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o; ;de nas so la ma reg par med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:380a-4: de nas dngos grub tu 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:380a-5: de nyin re ti na ra re re dbul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:380a-6: dpon g-yog bcu gnyis kyi zas dbul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:380a-9: rig sngags gang gzhag la byin pa'i rig sngags de phyi dro bzlas brjod bgyis la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:380a-10: phyi de nyin rig pa mchog gi snying po dang lhan cig bzlas brjod bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:380a-11: de la tshigs su bcad par 'gyur gyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:380a-13: de nas 'byung po'i bdag po dbang ldan gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:380a-15: rig pa'i rgyal po yi ge bzhi pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:380a-16: bskal pa bzhir gnas pa lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:380a-18: rig pa'i rgyal po rdzu 'phrul che ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:380a-24: ming brjod pas bdag la gnod pa lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:380b-0: da nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'byung po'i bdag po dbang ldan la 'di skad ces @380b bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:380b-3: ji skad smras pa de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:380b-5: rig pa'i rgyal po chen po rig pa mchog 'di ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:380b-8: rig pa'i rgyal po chen po 'di ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:380b-9: 'gro lding ba'i gzugs can 'gro lding gi skad du brjod pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:380b-11: rig pa'i rgyal po chen po'i mchog 'di ni; phyag 'tshal ba dang bcas par yi ge sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:380b-12: yi ge bzhi pa 'di yang mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:380b-14: bskal pa bzhir gnas pa yin no; ;bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad nas bzung ste bshad pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:380b-16: 'di thos na sems can gang dag mtshams med pa lnga byed pa de dag kyang sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par skye ba de ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:380b-17: gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:380b-18: rig pa'i rgyal po chen po rig pa mchog gi mthu ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:380b-21: nor bu rin po che chen po'i rgyal po gtsug tor ldan zhes bya ba mthong ba tsam gyis nad thams cad med par 'gyur zhing gdon thams cad kyang 'bros par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:380b-23: de bzhin du rig pa'i rgyal po chen po bzhi dag gang gis bzlas brjod byas pa de mtshon gyis 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:381a-3: de yang bar mdor 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:381a-4: ngan 'gro log par ltung bar mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:381a-5: nges par rdo rje'i rigs su skye bar 'gyur ro; ;de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te spyan sngar 'dug nas mgo btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to; ;bcom ldan 'das /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:381a-6: ci'i skad du rig pa'i rgyal po lag na rdo rje 'di skad du rig pa'i rgyal po mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:381a-7: mtshungs pa med pa 'di bdag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad nas bzung ste bshad do zhes gsung /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:381a-9: bdag gi mngon par shes pa'i stobs kyis m'a ma k'i de ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba yang rjes su dran te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:381a-10: rdo rje 'chang chen po 'di nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig gi gsung rab la lha rnams la m'a ma k'i bstan te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:381a-11: 'khor 'dus pa der mtshams med pa bgyis pa'i sems can gcig cig ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na mchis pa de 'od zer gyi snang ba de mthong nas yid dga' bar gyur te rnam par bltas nas rig sngags 'chang rnams kyi rgyal bo rdo rje phreng ba zhes bgyi bar 'gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:381a-12: sh'a ri'i bus rig sngags 'chang de la bsams so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:381b-0: de nas bcom ldan @381b 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:381b-1: de dang sh'a ri'i bu yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:381b-3: de'i slad du m'a ma k'i de ltar rdzu 'phrul che'o zhes bdag mchi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:381b-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:381b-6: don de rdo rje 'chang chen po la dris shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:381b-7: de nas sh'a ri'i bus rdo rje 'chang chen po la 'di skad ces smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:381b-9: khyod ci'i phyir bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad nas bzung ste bdag gis rig pa'i rgyal po chen po 'di bshad ces de skad smra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:381b-10: rdo rje 'chang chen pos 'di skad ces smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:381b-13: ci de bzhin gshegs pa gtso bo yin nam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:381b-14: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gtso bo yin /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:381b-15: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gtso bo yin nam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:381b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa gtso bo yin zhe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:381b-18: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:381b-19: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:381b-20: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bshad do /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:381b-22: de bzhin du bdag gis kyang rig pa'i rgyal po chen po mchog gi snying po la byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:382a-1: gshegs pa ye shes sgron ma chen po'i 'od zer gyi rgyal po de'i mthus m'a ma k'i phyag rgya chen po'i rgyal mo chen mo de thob bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:382a-2: de nas sh'a ri'i bu cang mi smra bar gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:382a-3: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'byung po'i bdag po dbang ldan la bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:382a-5: gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag gang+g'a'i klung dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed la phyag byas pa byas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:382a-6: gang gis rig pa'i rgyal po chen po'i mchog lag na rdo rje la yid kyis phyag byas pa de ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:382a-7: de nyid las bsod nams mang du bskyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:382a-8: de nas byang chub sems dpa' rtogs pa dri ma med pas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:382a-10: byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje 'dis ji srid cig nas rig pa'i rgyal po chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:382a-11: rig sngags 'chang gi bdag por bskos pa thob ste; 'di ting nge 'dzin gang gis gnas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:382a-12: 'di'i sngon gyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:382a-15: de skad ces gsol ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:382a-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rtogs pa dri ma med pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:382a-17: rtogs pa dri ma med pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:382b-0: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa @382b gang+g'a'i klung dgu bcu'i bye ma snyed 'das pa na gdul dka' zhes bya ba'i bskal pa chen po byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:382b-1: bskal ba chen po la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ye shes sgron ma chen mo'i 'od zer zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:382b-3: 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:382b-4: de'i tshe de'i dus na rdo rje ldan zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:382b-5: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes sgron ma chen po'i 'od zer de ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:382b-6: byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug cu la mun pa mun nag rnam par sel ba rnam par snang byed ces bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba 'chad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:382b-7: rdo rje 'chang gi rigs 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams dpag tu med pa nas 'dus pa 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa'i rngul phra rab snyed la ting nge 'dzin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:382b-8: gzungs kyi sngags pa dpag tu med pa bstan pa'i phyir 'dzum pa mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:383a-0: de nas rdo rje 'chang chen po'i khyu mchog tu gyur pa 'jig rten mtha' yas pa'i dbang phyug gi rgyal po zhes bya ba 'khor 'dus pa de nyid du 'dus par gyur ba de stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g-yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das kyi @383a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:383a-1: zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas yang langs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:383a-2: rtogs yangs pa chen po rab 'byams kyi 'og gi phyogs nas phyag rgya chen po bsgyur bas rdo rje blangs te phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams mtha' yas rgya mtsho rnam pa bcu yang dag par bskul nas de dag gis rgyal po bsgyings par bsgyur bas rgya mtsho chen po bsdu ba'i tshul gyi nga rgyal chen po nges rdo rje gsor nas dus kyi tha ma 'jig pa'i me lta bu'i mig gi 'dzum pa'i 'od zer 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'og gi phyogs kyi phyag rgya bsgyur bas rdo rje de de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung du bzhag ste zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas de bzhin gshegs pa de la 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu de zhus pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:383a-3: de ci'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor 'dus pa la 'dzum pa bstan /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:383a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:383a-5: smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas sngon ma byung ba'i 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs byung /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:383a-7: de'i slad du 'khor 'dis bskul nas bdag bcom ldan 'das la zhu zhing mchis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:383a-8: thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag dang byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs 'di la thugs brtse pa'i slad du bka' stsal du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:383b-0: rdo rje bsgyings @383b pa chen po 'jig rten mtha' yas pa'i dbang phyug gi rgyal po lag na rdo rjes de skad zhus pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:383b-1: de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis mtshan dpal be'u chen po las mthon kha chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:383b-2: beed'ur+ya lta bu 'od zer nor bu rin po che chen po skar mdog lta bu'i 'od dang ldan pa 'od zer chen po'i dkyil 'khor phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams mtha' yas par cher snang ba'i 'od zer gyi me lce byung nas dri ma med pa'i 'od zer rnam par 'phro ba'i dkyil 'khor las lag pa g-yon pas rdo rje blangs pa las gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje rig pa'i rgyal po chen po byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:383b-9: g-yung drung 'khyil pa mchog tu mdzes shing me 'bar ba lta bu las ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:383b-17: rgyal mo chen mo pho nya mo dang 'khro du bcas pa bdun po de dag byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:383b-18: de dag gi mdun du ma rungs pa khro bo'i gzugs stobs po chen dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:383b-19: khro bo ki li ki li dus kyi ma'i rin po che lta bu rdo rje khu tshur las byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:383b-22: phrag pa 'bar zhing mdzes pa las ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:384a-0: de ltar 'khor dang bcas pa'i pho nya mo @384a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:384a-1: bcu'o; ;de bzhin du drug cu phrag bzhir bsgre'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:384a-2: rtogs pa dri ma med pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:384a-3: 'di ltar lag na rdo rje g-yog 'khor dang bcas shing pho nya mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:384a-4: 'khor dang bcas pa byung nas dam tshig chen po dang ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes sgron ma mchen po'i 'od zer las des de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis gsol ba btab pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:384a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa de'i ma med bzhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag ste thog mar de bzhin gshegs pas sku dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:384a-7: thugs kyi gsang ba bcu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:384a-8: gsang ba mtha' yas dkrigs phrag bye ba dang ldan ba'i mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po de gdul dka' ba rnams 'dul ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:384a-9: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes bstan pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor dam tshig can 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khro du bshad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:384a-10: rtogs pa dri ma med pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:384a-11: de tshun chad bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes sgron ma chen po'i 'od zer de la sogs pa sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i gam du bdud pham par mdzad nas bstan pa kun tu bzung bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:384a-12: rtogs pa dri ma med pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:384b-0: de la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes sgron ma chen po 'od zer de'i @384b 'og tu bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa drug pa la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don gzigs pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:384b-1: bcom ldan 'das de'i gsung rab la bdud cang mi smra ba zhes bya ba de byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:384b-2: rtogs pa dri ma med ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:384b-3: lag na rdo rje des kyang bdud pham par byas nas don gzigs pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa brgyad cu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:384b-4: sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa gcig las bdud pham par byas te bstan pa srung bar byas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:384b-5: de tshun chang bskal ba dgu bcu rtsa drug lhag ba zhig 'das nas sangs rgyas gser du snang bas rnam par rol ba zhes bya ba bskal ba bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad las bdud pham par byas te bstan pa kun tu bsrungs par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:384b-6: de'i 'og tu der stong snyed 'das nas lag na rdo rje 'di de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi gsang ba 'dzin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:384b-7: bstan pa srung bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:384b-8: de bzhin du sbyar te tha mar de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug tor can dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:384b-12: de bzhin du log par dang sel dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:384b-15: nga'i bstan pa la yang ma dul ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:385a-0: de bzhin du gsang ba 'dzin cing bskal pa bzang po la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di nyid du @385a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:385a-1: sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:385a-2: bskal pa bzang po'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed pa thams cad la de bzhin du mthar gyis thabs 'dis bstan pa la bya ba byas nas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:385a-3: rdo rje'i rtsal gyis 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pas bka' stsal to; ;de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'byung po'i bdag po dbang ldan gyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:385a-5: bdag gis kyang rig pa mchog gi las stsal bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:385a-6: ma god pa'i ras la ri mo mkhan gso sbyong bzung bas sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs gser gyi kha dog ltar 'brir stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:385a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa'i g-yas rol du lag na rdo rje mdog sngo bsangs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:385a-8: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:385a-9: lag na rdo rje'i g-yas rol du ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:385a-10: pho nya mo bcu gnyis te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:385a-11: rgyal ba'i blo gros ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:385a-12: me kha la ni; sngo bsangs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:385a-18: gyen du lta ba'i gdong ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:385b-4: dmar mor bri bar bgyi ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:385b-5: pho nya mo thams cad kyang rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:385b-6: bcom ldan 'das kyi g-yon rol tu dbang phyug chen po mdog dkar po ral pa can mtshan ma bsgreng ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:385b-7: dka' thub zlog pa dang lhan cig bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:385b-8: 'byung po mdog dmar po mi sdug pa bzhi yang bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:385b-9: phyis rig sngags 'chang gis dus gsum du khrus bgyi zhing zla ba gcig gi bar du brgyad brgya brgyad brgya bzlas brjod bgyi zhing zas su chu skyo btung bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:385b-10: tha mar lus sbyang ba bgyi ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:385b-11: de'i 'og tu zhag gsum smyung ba bgyis la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:385b-12: gnas bzhir bsnyen bkur bgyid pa bzhi gzhag go //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:385b-13: pho nya mo rnams kyis las thams cad bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:385b-14: ri mo'i sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar rtsva ku sha spam sa pa'i steng du 'dug ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:385b-15: mchod pa rgya cher bgyis la gtor ma yang shin tu rgya cher bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:385b-16: lce pog gi bdug pas bdug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:385b-17: ri mo'i sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar aarga'i shing gi zhugs bus la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:385b-18: me tog dkar po zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:385b-20: mar la smyugs pas me stag dag byung gi bar du sbyin sreg bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:385b-21: de'i 'og tu autpa la sngon po lta gbu'i ral gri byung gi bar du lcags phyes sbyin sreg bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:385b-22: de blangs ma thag tu skra lcang lo 'khyil bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:386a-3: dpon g-yog drug nam mkha' la mchi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:386a-4: lo khri nyis stong thub par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:386a-5: de bzhin du grogs rnams kyang dpag tshad stong du gyen du 'phags par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:386a-6: de bzhin du 'og ma dbang phyug chen po'i ral gri bsgrub par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:386a-7: gzhan yang ral gri sgrub pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:386a-8: zla ba gcig slong mo'i zas za zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:386a-9: phyis mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la ri mo'i gzugs kyi mdun du pho nya mo rnams kyis las thams cad bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:386a-10: zhag gsum smyung ba bgyis te ral gri ma chag cing 'phan med pa blangs la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:386a-11: ral gri lag pa g-yas na thogs te 'bar gyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:386a-12: de blangs pa tsam gyis nam mkha' la 'phag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:386a-13: lo bcu drug lon pa lta bur 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:386a-14: rig sngags 'chang stong gi bdag por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:386a-15: lo khri nyis stong thub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:386a-16: gzhan yang 'khor lo sgrub pa bshad par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:386a-17: slong mo'i zas bza' zhing phyis mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi nas zhag gsum smyung ba bgyis te lag na rdo rje'i mdun du mchod pa rgya cher bgyis la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:386a-18: gtor ma dang lha bshos kyang shin tu rgya cher sbyar cing pho nya mo rnams kyis las thams cad bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:386a-19: lcags sna gsum la 'khor lo rtsibs bcu drug pa bgyis la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:386b-0: shing @386b aa shva ttha'i lo ma bdun gyi steng du bzhag la 'bar gyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:386b-2: rig sngags 'chang thams cad skrag par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:386b-3: des blangs pa tsam gyis skra lcang lo 'khyil bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:386b-4: lo bcu drug lon pa lta bur 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:386b-5: mdog nyi ma shar ba bzhin du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:386b-6: rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:386b-8: dpon g-yog bcu drug 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:386b-9: rig sngags 'chang gzhan brgya yang 'byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:386b-11: gang gi gnas che ge mo zhes bgyi bar mchi bar bsam pa de'i tshe 'khor lo dpag tshad tsam du me lce 'bar ba stong 'byin cing 'gro ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:386b-12: bsdo ba ci yod pa phung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:386b-14: gang gi tshe 'chi ba de'i tshe lha'i nang du skye'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:386b-15: de nas rig pa'i rgyal po las kyi dkyil 'khor bshad par bgyi ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:386b-16: brtag pa bgyis la gnas ma nyams par shes rab can gyis dkyil 'khor bri'o /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:386b-17: khru ni bcu gnyis sgo bzhi pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:386b-18: de bzhin du ni khru brgyad la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:386b-19: de la thog mar bri ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:386b-20: rim pa gnyis pa dmar po ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:386b-21: rim pa gsum pa nag po'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:386b-22: dkyil 'khor de yi byang phyogs su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:386b-23: sangs rgyas bcom ldan bri bar bgyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:386b-24: de bzhin gshegs dang nye bar ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:387a-1: ldan phyag na rdo rje ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:387a-2: rdo rje thogs shing rim pas bskor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:387a-3: sgo rnams kun tu bsrung bar bgyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:387a-4: sgo bzhir sgo ba rnams bri 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:387a-5: shar phyogs su ni drag po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:387a-6: gzhon nu dang ni ma mo bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:387a-7: lho phyogs su ni khyab 'jug dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:387a-8: nyi zla dang ni tshangs pa bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:387a-9: nub phyogs su ni gshin rje dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:387a-10: ka tya'i bu mo gtum mo bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:387a-11: byang phyogs su ni lha mo dpal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:387a-12: de bzhin lha mo dbyangs can bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:387a-13: lha rnams 'di dag thams cad ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:387a-14: ji skad bshad pa bzhin du bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:387a-15: bya ma bu ma mgul chings can gyis bskor zhing sgo skor yang gzhag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:387a-16: dbus su gtun shing skra'i srad bu dang bcas pa gcig gzhag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:387a-17: bya ma bum gyi lho phyogs su rdo rje bri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:387a-18: lha rnams kyang mtshon cha dang bcas par bgyi ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:387a-27: zla ba dang nyi ma'i ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:387a-33: gzhan dag mtshon cha tha mal pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:387a-34: zhugs na rab tu bus nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:387a-35: brgyad brgyad tshang ba'i yam srog shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:387a-36: lha bshos dri dang bdug pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:387a-37: gtor ma btsal nas lha spyan dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:387a-38: sbyin sreg 'di ni sbrang rtsi dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:387b-0: mar dang 'bras yos lan tshva @387b dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:387b-1: de bzhin yungs kar rnams kyis bgyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:387b-2: yungs kar gyis ni srung ba bgyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:387b-3: gtsang ma'i gos ni bgo bar bgyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:387b-4: mchod pa dag ni sngar bgyis te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:387b-5: de yi 'og tu las brtsam mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:387b-6: 'jig rten na ni ci yod pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:387b-7: mna' tshig rnams kyis ma nas bsgrag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:387b-8: dam tshig 'di ltar su srung ba de la log 'dren thams cad kyis glags mi rnyed cing las kyang dngos grub tu 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:387b-9: dkon mchog gsum la dang pas dkyil 'khor sngar mthong nas de'i 'og tu rig pa mchog bsgrub par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:387b-10: su zhig gzhan du bgyid na de'i rdo rje nyid kyis mthar bgyid par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:387b-11: dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:387b-12: rig pa mchog sgrub pa 'di ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:387b-14: zla ba gcig zas su 'o skyo 'thungs la phyis mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi nas zhag gsum smyung ba bgyis te gos gtsang ma dgos la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:387b-15: ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten nam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:387b-16: sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:387b-18: bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje yang ci nus su mchod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:387b-19: pho nya rnams kyis dri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:387b-22: gtor ma sbyin no; ;de nas lcags kyi ral gri bgyis te bung med rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:387b-23: bud med bcus bskor ba nam 'ongs kyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:388a-2: ral gri de g-yog 'khor la bzhag na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:388a-3: bud med de chung mar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:388a-5: bud med de dag kyang chung mar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:388a-8: g-yog 'khor rnams dang lhan cig tu nam mkha' la mchi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:388a-9: 'og tu yang dpag tshang stong du yang mchi'o; ;steng du yang de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:388a-10: ral gri de thogs na 'khor los bsgyur ba ma gtogs par rig sngags 'chad thams cad kyis mi sod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:388a-12: sgrub pa gzhan yang yod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:388a-15: smyung ba bya mi dgos so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:388a-16: bud med de legs par bsku zhing me tog gis kyang mchod la pho nya mo rnams kyis kyang las bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:388a-17: de'i 'og tu bud med de kha bub tu bzhag la bud med de'i rgyab tu zhon te bud med de 'gul zhing sgra 'byin yang 'jigs par mi bya zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:388a-18: gyen du 'phag gi bar du rig pa'i rgyal po bzlas brjod bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:388a-20: lhung nas de las 'bab par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:388a-21: de nas bud med rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa rnams mthong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:388a-22: de'i nang nas bud med cig kha bub tu 'dug cing dbugs 'byin pa de'i rgyab tu zhon na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:388b-0: nam mkha' la 'phag cing mdog nyi ma shar ba lta bur 'gyur @388b ro; ;bud med kyi glo la ral gri 'dzam bu'i chu ba'i gser gyis brgyan cing mu tig dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:388b-1: rin po ches spras pa 'phyang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:388b-3: rgyal mtshan dang 'gre'o zhes smras nas bya'o; ;le lo can dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:388b-4: byas pa mi gzo ba rnams kyis las 'di mi bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:388b-5: gang nus pa brtan zhing mthu stobs dang ldan pa rtsol par nges par byas pas las 'di brtsam par ste; las 'di sgrub pa pos rtag tu go cha sra ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:388b-6: tshangs par spyod par bya zhing nya dang sha yongs su spang bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:388b-7: rig sngags 'chang gis ldong ros sgrub pa'i tshe gal te ste na; de dgug pa'i phyir 'di brtsam par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:388b-12: grul bum yang rung ste dbab pa byas pa de la gang gis rdzas khyer ba des nga la slar byin cig dang phung bar mi bya'o zhes brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:388b-13: mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis te zangs po che btsugs la 'bru mar blugs te bskol la rig pa'i rgyal po bzlas brjod byas na rig sngags 'chang grub pa yang rung /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:388b-14: gang yin pa de der 'ong zhing 'ongs nas kyang slar 'bul la de la ci yang mi bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:388b-16: phyis snying pos yan lag dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:399a-23: chad pas gcod pa lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:399a-24: lha rnams 'chi 'pho bar bgyid pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:399a-26: phur bus gdab par bgyid par 'tshal bas mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la zhag gsum smyung ba bgyis te ba'i lci ba sa la ma lhung ba las brgya byin gyi gzugs bgyis la lag na rdo rje'i mdun du bzhag ste de'i steng du shing kun gyi shing gi zhugs bus la bri yang ku'i yam sreg shing yungs kar gyi 'bru mar la smyugs pa brgya stong sbyin sreg bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:399b-0: de nas lha rnams so so nas tshig @399b cing brgya byin gyi gan du mchi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:399b-1: brgya byin yang lha rnams dbugs 'byin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:399b-2: grogs po dag ma 'jigs shig ces lha rnams dbugs phyung nas rig sngags 'chang gi gan du mchi ste phyin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:399b-3: tshig 'di skad du kye ma'o rig sngags 'chang la dge sbyong gi tshul med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:399b-5: rig sngags 'chang gis 'di skad du bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rjes gang bshad pa de dran par gyis shig ces brjod par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:399b-6: de thos nas shin tu dga' ba'i bzhin gyis rig sngags 'chang la rig pa stsol lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:399b-7: de'i 'og tu rig sngags 'chang gi rig pa mchog gis slar gtang bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:399b-8: rig pa des rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:399b-9: rig sngags 'chang bdun stong gi bdag por bskal bar gnas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:399b-10: lha rnams kyang g-yos par bgyid par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:399b-11: gnod sbyin rnams kyang phung bar bgyid par 'tshal bas gang nas gnod sbyin nam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:399b-12: gnod sbyin mo gnas pa der mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la mchis la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis te byang chub kyi shing gi zhugs bus la aa pa mrga'i yam sreg shing las lan brgya stong sbyin sreg bgyi'o; ;de nas gnod sbyin de dag 'bros pa tshur shog ces brjod na slar mchi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:399b-13: mchis nas kyang de'i bsnyen bkur gyis shig ces brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:400a-0: gdugs gcig bzhin du ti na @400a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:400a-2: gang du bskos pa de thams cad bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:400a-3: dri za rnams lhung bar bgyid par 'tshal bas rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i klung gi ngos su yar gyi ngo tshes brgyad la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis te kham po dza'i shing gi zhugs bus la yungs kar mar dang bsres pas lan khrir sbyin sreg bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:400a-4: de nas yi dvags kyi gzugs can gyi mi zhig mchi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:400a-5: mchis nas kyang rkang pa gnyis la phyag bgyid pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:400a-6: bde bar gyur cig ces brjod par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:400a-7: de nas mi des rkang pa gnyis la lig bu mig bzhag nas slar mchi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:400a-8: lig bu mig des mig bskus na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:400a-11: lo lnga stong thub bar 'gyur ro; ;dri za rnams kyang srung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:400a-14: log 'dren rnams kyang brlag par bgyid na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:400a-15: sman aa sa de ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:400a-16: shing ba la kar ba sa'i tshig gu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:400a-19: rdzas de dag gis gnod sbyin gyi gzugs la bdug par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:400a-20: rig pa yang lan brgya stong bzlas brjod bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:400a-21: de nas rmi lam du log 'dren rnams bred cing ci bya gtol med par mthong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:400a-22: de'i nang nas mi zhig 'di skad ces kyi rig sngags 'chang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:400b-0: bdag cag @400b la gnod pa ma mdzad par 'di snoms shig ces smra'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:400b-1: de nas nang bar ti na ra cig stsol lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:400b-2: sgrub pa'i dus na yang bdug pa 'di nyid kyis bdag la bdugs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:400b-3: log 'dren thams cad nyams par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:400b-4: log 'dren gyi las bgyi na yang mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis la bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:400b-5: rdo rje'i rigs skrag par bgyi na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:400b-6: lce 'bab pas bcag pa'i shing blangs la mar gyi ngo zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis te lag na rdo rje'i mdun du lce 'bab pas bcag pa'i shing gi zhugs bus la kham po dza'i yam sreg shing brgya stong sbyin sreg bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:400b-7: rdo rje'i rigs thams cad skrag par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:400b-8: ri'i dngos grub kyang stsol lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:400b-11: dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa la gnod pa bgyid na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:400b-12: mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la zhag gsum smyung ba bgyis te mtshan gcig mchis par mchis la ci nus kyis mchod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:400b-13: mtshan ma khrag gis bskus la khros pa dang bcas pas lag pa gnyis kas 'khyud de rig pa lan brgya stong bzlas brjod bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:400b-15: skrag par 'gyur zhing rang gi cho ga rgyas pa rnams kyi dngos grub stsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:401a-0: de ltar cho ga rgyas pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur @401a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:401a-1: ro; ;lag na rdo rje la phur bus gdab na mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis te lag na rdo rje'i mdun du seng ldeng gi shing gi zhugs bus la kham po dza'i yam sreg shing brgya stong sbyin sreg bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:401a-2: sreg blugs gsum pa'i tshe 'dar ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:401a-5: bzhi brgya pa'i tshe lag na rdo rje la phur bus btab par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:401a-6: lag na rdo rje phur bus btab pas lag na rdo rje'i rigs thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:401a-9: dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa thams cad kyang phur bus btab par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:401a-10: brgya stong tshang ba'i tshe lag na rdo rje'i tshig nas mchi ste rig sngags 'chang ci 'dod ci sbyin ces brjod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:401a-12: cho ga rgyas pa dngos grub bdag la stsal du gsol zhes brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:401a-13: de ltar gyur cig ces brjod nas mi snang bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:401a-14: de nas rig sngags 'chang gis myur bar lag na rdo rje'i gzugs 'o mas bkru bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:401a-15: de nas mchis pa'i mar dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:401a-16: gu gul gyis lan brgya stong sbyin sreg bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:401b-0: lha la yang mchod pa rgya cher bgyis la shugs @401b ldan mas slar gshegs su gsol lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:401b-1: bcom ldan 'das rig pa'i rgyal po sgrub pa'i rig sngags 'chang la gal te dngos grub tu ma gyur na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:401b-2: rig sngags 'chang des las bdag gir bya ba yin par dmigs par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:401b-3: lan gnyis su yang bsgrub par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:401b-4: ma grub na yang las bdag gir bya ba yin par dmigs par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:401b-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:401b-11: tshangs pa la gnod pa bgyis pa'i sems can dag kyang mchis /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:401b-12: mtshams ma mchis pa lnga dang ldan pa'i sems can dag kyang mchis te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:401b-14: de'i slad du bdag 'di skad ces brtson 'grus brtsams la bsgrub par bya'o zhes mchi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:401b-15: lan bdun du yang sgrub pa la 'jug par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:401b-17: las 'di brtsam par bgyi ste; mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la nyin zhag gcig smyung bar bgyis la dur khrod kyi shing gi zhugs bus te seng ldeng gi yam sreg gi shing la bdag gi khrag byugs la lan brgya stong sbyin sreg bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:401b-18: gal te ma mchis na rang gi shas lan brgya stong sbyin sreg bgyis na mchi bar bgyi ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:402a-0: bcom ldan 'das rig sngags kyi dngos grub @402a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:402a-3: mchog tu mi bzad pa lags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:402a-4: rig sngags 'chang des mi bzad pa'i las 'di thog mar mi bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:402a-5: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:402a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:402a-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'gal bar bgyi ba ma lags pa lta bu ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:402a-8: gal te rig sngags 'chang gis las thog mar brtsam ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:402a-11: bdag la gnod pa bgyid de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:402a-12: de kho na nyid kyang mi mthong la bdag la gnod pa bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:402a-13: bcom ldan 'das; bdag la gnod pa bgyid na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:402a-14: lha thams cad la gnod pa bgyid par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:402a-15: gnod sbyin thams cad la yang gnod pa bgyis par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:402a-16: de dag rig sngags 'chang de la glags tshol zhing mchis par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:402a-17: gal te mtshams ma mchis pa lnga dang ldan pa'i rig sngags 'chang zhig rig pa'i rgyal po bsgrubs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:402a-18: sgrub pa bdun pa la dngos grub stsal bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:402a-20: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'khus par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:402a-22: gzhan yang gang gis rig sngags 'chang rnams kyi dngos grub tu 'gyur ba'i rdzas rnams mi 'phrog par brjod par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:402a-23: byang chub sems dpa' chen po smros shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:402b-1: rig sngags 'chang gis lig bu mig dang ldong ros la sogs pa sgrub na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:402b-2: thog mar 'o mas bkru bar bgyi ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:402b-3: bkrus pas dngos grub tu 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:402b-4: dngos grub tu gyur pa'i rdzas rnams kyang rig sngags 'chang gi bla ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:402b-6: grogs rnams la cha gsum du bgo bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:402b-9: mdung rtse gsum pa zhig grub la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:402b-10: stor na yid kyis 'di snyam du sems can gang bsod nams chung ba de'i stor grang snyam du bsam la rig sngags 'chang des sbyin sreg bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:402b-11: yang na lag pa bkan te mnan no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:402b-12: gal te shin tu gnod pa bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:402b-13: rig sngags 'chang des 'di skad du rdzas 'di ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:402b-14: lag na rdo rje'i yin no zhes brjod par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:402b-16: bdag gi ming thos nas yid kyis kyang 'khu bas sems pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:402b-19: tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:402b-20: dge sbyong dang bram ze'i skye rgu dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na ma mthong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:402b-21: de nas thams cad dang bcas pa'i 'khor des byang chub sems dpa' chen po legs so legs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:402b-22: stobs dang pha rol gnon pa dpag tu med pa khyod seng+ge'i sgra 'di lta bu 'byin pa legs so zhes te legs so zhes bya ba byin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:403a-1: gi nye ba'i snying po lags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:403a-2: 'di lan gcig brjod pas cho ga chen po rgyas pa brgyad brjod par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:403a-6: rig pa'i rgyal po 'di bdun sgrub pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:403a-9: ci ste rig sngags 'chang rig sngags sgrub par 'tshal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:403a-10: rig sngags 'chang des thog mar rig sngags de lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:403a-11: nye ba'i snying po yang lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:403a-12: de nas rig sngags 'chang gis rig sngags bsgrub par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:403a-13: gal te rig sngags ma grub na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:403a-14: de nyid du mchis la du ba mchis pa'i me mdag tu ske tshe las lan brgya stong sbyin sreg bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:403a-15: rig pa de nyams par gyur nas de'i mdun du mchi ste dngos grub tu stsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:403a-16: de nyid du mchis la rig sngags 'chang gis yang rig pa bsgrub na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:403a-18: gsang sngags thams cad kyi las kyang 'dis 'grub pa lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:403b-0: spos rnams kyi lag na rdo rje'i gzugs bgyis la gdugs bdun dus gsum du lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis la mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi pa la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis @403b te dpag tu ma mchis par bzlas brjod bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:403b-1: gnod sbyin mo mchi bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:403b-2: rdo rje bzhad mas smrar stsal bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:403b-3: gang gi tshe ngas che ge mo zhes bya ba la rgyobs shig rgyobs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:403b-7: ma rungs par gyis shig ces bsgo ba thams cad la gnod pa gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:403b-8: bcom ldan 'das dran pa tsam gyis kyang thams cad gyis shig ces bsgo bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:403b-9: nye ba'i snying po rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:403b-10: nag mo drag mo'i las rnams lags te gsang sngags thams cad du gsang sngags gang las mi bgyid pa de nag mo drag mo 'dis bkug na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:403b-12: bkug kyang gal te ma grub na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:403b-13: phyem red lag na rdo rje'i mdun du rig sngags de lan bdun brjod la de'i 'og tu nag mo drag mo'i sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:403b-14: de nas sngags de rmi lam du ston par bgyid do; ;yi ge ma tshang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:403b-15: phur bu btab pas spra bar bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:403b-16: gal te yi ge ma tshang bar gyur na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:403b-17: rig pa mchog gis tshang bar bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:403b-18: gal te phur bus btab bar gyur na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:403b-19: rig pa mchog nyid kyis phur bus 'byung bar bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:404a-0: phyem red lag na rdo rje'i mdun du mchod pa bgyis la sngags de rang gi khrag gis shing ta la'i @404a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:404a-1: lo ma bris te rtsva ku sha las bgyis pa'i rdo rje la bdun sngags la bsnun na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:404a-2: de nas phur bu 'byin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:404a-4: me tog gis bgyi'o; ;gdon rengs par bgyid na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:404a-5: lan gsum bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i chab kyis bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:404a-9: rna bar bzlas brjod bgyis pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:404a-11: sha ka ra'i chab la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis na gtong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:404a-12: tsandan dmar po las rdo rje bgyis la mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis te lag na rdo rje'i mdun du ba lang gi shas bdug par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:404a-13: rig pa yang lan brgya stong bzlas brjod bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:404a-14: pha rol brjed byed kyis zin par bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:404a-15: rdo rje 'o mas bkrus la rig pa yang lan brgya stong bzlas brjod bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:404a-16: thar par yang bgyis par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:404a-17: rdo rje de nyid la sha chen pos bdugs la rig pa yang lan brgya stong bzlas brjod bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:404a-19: tshes grangs dang skar ma gdam mi 'tshal /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:404b-0: dgra gsad par 'tshal bas gos rlon pa bgos la kha gdugs bltas te dgra'i srog bskams kyi bar du gsang sngags @404b bzlas brjod bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:404b-1: rdo rje 'o mas bkrus la rig pa yang lan brgya stong bzlas brjod bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:404b-3: gal te nag mo drag mo sgrub par 'tshal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:404b-4: thog ma nyid du zas su 'o skyo 'tshal zhing lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:404b-5: de'i 'og tu ri mo mkhan gso sbyong bzung bas ma god pa'i ras la sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs gser mdog lta bu bri bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:404b-6: de'i g-yon rol du nag mo drag mo bri bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:404b-7: mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la zhag gsum smyung ba bgyis te mchod pa rgya cher bgyis la nag mo drag mo mchi bar 'gyur gyi bar du rig pa bzlas brjod bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:404b-8: mchis pa dang rig pa mchog gis mchod yon dbul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:404b-9: de nas de rig sngags 'dzin ci sbyin par bya zhes mchi ba dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:410a-11: aarga'i me tog dur khrod kyi mes bsregs nas mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis nas lha chen po'i gnas su mchis la shing aa shvattha'i lo ma'i steng du bzhag ste lan brgya stong bzlas brjod bgyis la thig le bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:410a-13: lo lnga stong thub par 'gyur ro //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:411a-1: bgyi'o; ;mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi nas zhag gsum smyung ba bgyis te ci nus kyis mchod pa bgyis la tsandan dmar po mtho gang la rdo rje bgyis te /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:411a-10: lo bdun stong thub par 'gyur ro //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:411a-12: gang mthong ba de dbang du 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:411a-14: skye gnas su gtogs pa yang dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:411a-15: zla ba gcig zas su chu grog 'tshal zhing mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad nas zhag gsum smyung ba bgyis te ba lang gi lhas sam /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:411a-19: 'ji ba las bgyis pa'i mo mtshan gyi steng du gzhag par bgyi zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:411b-0: gdol pa'i bu mo ral gri thogs pa bzhi phyogs bzhir bzhag par bgyis @411b la; de nas rig sngags 'chang gi dngos grub rnam pa gsum byung gi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:411b-2: gdugs shar ba 'dra ba'i mdog tu 'gyur /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:411b-4: 'og tu dpag tshad stong du mchi bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:411b-5: steng du yang de bzhin mchi bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:411b-6: dpag tshad stong tshun chad kyis thos shing mthong bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:411b-8: nam mkha' la rlung gi shugs ngang mtshungs par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:411b-9: grub pa thams cad kyang 'des dbang du 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:411b-10: tshes grangs dang skar ma 'dam mi 'tsha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:411b-11: smyung ba bgyi mi 'tshal te bud med gyi ro blangs la lig bu mig de'i mo mtshan gyi steng du bzhag ste mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis la lag na rdo rje'i mdun du mchod la bgyis te lan brgya stong bzlas brjod bgyis la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:411b-12: lig bu mig de blangs te mig la bskus na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:411b-14: lo bdun stong thub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:411b-15: mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis te gdol ba'i khyim nas zhugs blangs la seng ldeng gi shing gi zhugs bus te dug dang khrag dang bsres pa'i yungs kar gyis lan brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:411b-16: gang gi ming nas smos te sbyin sreg bgyis pa de dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:412a-0: mar gyi ngo zhag bcu gnyis la mi rus kyi thur mas blangs te lan brgya stong bzlas brjod bgyis la dgra'i khyim @412a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:412a-3: rdo rje lte ba'i cho ga rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:412a-4: me kha la'i las rnams lags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:412a-6: lan gdun bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i srad bus lag pa la bcing bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:412a-8: lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i chab kyis bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:412a-10: bye'u rug pa'i lo ma'am rma bya'i mdongs kyis bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:412a-11: gdon la gnod pa bgyid na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:412a-15: kun dga'i ra bar mchis la gang du bzlas brjod bgyis pa de nas 'byung po gdon thams cad 'bros par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:412a-17: khrag gis gzugs bris la rkang pas mnan te lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na gdon gyi rigs phung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:412a-19: thog ma nyid las 'di bgyis te lag na rdo rje'i mdun du shle shme ta ka'i shing gis zhugs bus la ku ra ba'i me tog brgya stong sbyin sreg bgyis na lha des rig pa'i lha bzung nas khrid de mchi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:412a-20: khrid de mchis nas myur du dngos grub tu 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:412a-21: ci ste log 'dren rnams kyi rigs sgrub par 'tshal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:412a-22: log 'dren rnams kyi log 'dren gyi rigs ni /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:412b-1: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bgegs bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:412b-2: kam po dza'i rigs la ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:412b-3: dbang phyug chen po'i g-yog 'khor ba lang rna ba la sogs pa bgegs drug khri mchis te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:412b-4: dbang phyug chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa la bgegs bgyid cing rig pa yang 'joms par bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:412b-5: rnam par 'joms pa'i rigs la ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:412b-6: 'jig rten skyong ba'i g-yog 'khor mya ngan med la sogs pa log 'dren drug khri mchis te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:412b-7: de dag kyang dbang phyug chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:412b-8: phur bu gsum pa'i cho ga rgyas pa la bgegs bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:412b-9: phung byed kyi rigs la ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:412b-10: lag na rdo rje'i g-yog 'khor murda ta ka la sogs pa'i log 'dren bye ba phrag 'bum mchis te; de dag ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:412b-11: rig pa'i cho ga rgyas pa thams cad la bgegs bgyid cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:412b-12: rig pa yang 'joms par bgyid do //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:412b-18: grub nas kyang sgrub pa la bgegs mi bgyid de /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:413a-5: lag na rdo rje'i gzugs 'gul te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:413a-7: grub nas kyang dbang phyug chen po'i cho ga rgyas par bklags pa tsam gyis rig pa thams cad 'grub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:413a-8: rnam par 'joms pa'i rigs kyi sgrub pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:413a-9: mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis te mtshan gcig mchis par mchis la mchod pa rgya chen po bgyis la log 'dren rnams la yang gtor ma bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:413a-10: de'i mdun du be kang+ka ta'i zhugs bus la khrag dang bsres pa'i yungs kar gyis lan brgya stong sbyin sreg bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:413a-11: de'i 'og tu grib ma gda' zhing 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:413a-12: rnam par 'joms pa'i rigs grub na /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:413b-0: phung byed kyi rigs kyi sgrub pa ni; zla ba phyed zas su 'o skyo 'tshal zhing mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis te lag na rdo rje'i mdun du mchod ba rgya cher bgyis la zhugs @413b mar gnyis bus te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:413b-2: lag na rdo rje la dbul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:413b-4: murda ta ka la dbul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:413b-5: de nas rig sngags 'chang gis srung ba bgyis la lag na rdo rje'i mdun du seng ldeng gi shing gis zhugs bus te na le sham dkar po dag gi khrag bsres pas lan brgya stong sbyin sreg bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:413b-6: lag na rdo rje'i rkang pa g-yas pa'i mthe bong las 'od za 'byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:413b-8: phung byed kyi rigs sgrub na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:413b-9: rig pa'i cho ga thams cad bde bar sgrub tu mchis te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:413b-11: log 'dren de dag kyang phyag brnyan du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:413b-12: log 'dren rnams kyang rig sngags 'chang la gsang sngags stsol te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:413b-13: des lo stong thub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:413b-14: zas su 'o thug 'tshal zhing lag na rdo rje'i mdun du lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:413b-16: gdugs gcig bzhin karsha pa na brgya stong stsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:413b-17: rtag tu bzlas brjod bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:413b-18: dgra las rgyal lo; ;mar gyi ngo zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis te lag na rdo rje'i mdun du padma brgya stong phul na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:413b-19: rig pa'i rgyal po dam pa stsol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:413b-20: me kha la'i cho ga rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:413b-21: gdon dkar mo'i las rnams lags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:413b-22: ri mo mkhan gso sbyong bzung bas ma god pa'i ras la sbyin dang ma 'dres pa'i tshon gyis lag na rdo rje mdog sngo bsangs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:414a-2: pho nya mo bcu gnyis kyis bskor ba bri bar bgyi ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:414a-3: kha dog ji lta ba bzhin du bri bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:414a-4: pho nya mo thams cad kyang rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bri bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:414a-5: tha mar ri'i rtse mo rnams bri bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:414a-6: de nas rig sngags 'chang gis yar gyi ngo tshes gcig nas brtsams te zas su chu sgrog 'chal zhing mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la thug gi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:414a-7: mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis te lag na rdo rje la mchod pa rgya char bgyis la 'byung bo'i gtor ma yang bzang du bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:414a-8: de'i 'og tu rig sngags 'chang gis ri mo'i gzugs kyi mdun du byang chub kyi shing gis zhugs bus la padma zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar la smyugs pa brgya stong sbyin sreg bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:414a-9: de nas ca tso'i sgra chen po grag par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:414a-11: de nas gdong dkar mo gzugs mi sdug par bsgyur nas mchi ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:414a-12: de la yang ma 'jigs par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:414a-13: rdo rje bzhad ma'i bzlas brjod bgyis la de la 'di skad ces lag na rdo rje'i gnang chen ma bcom ldan 'das ma khyod legs par byon tam zhes brjod par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:414a-14: de de skad thos nas dga' bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:414a-15: des 'di skad du chi bya ba zhes brjod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:414b-0: bcom ldan 'das ma lo lnga @414b stong thub par 'tshal lo zhes brjod par bgyi ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:414b-1: de bzhin du gyur cig ces brjod nas dga' ba'i yid kyis ral gri stsol te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:414b-2: de nas mi gda' bar 'gyur ro //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:414b-4: gdugs shar ba lta bu'i mdog can du 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:414b-5: rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi snying du sdug par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:414b-6: ma bsgrubs par las rnams 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:414b-8: gdon gyis zin pa'i rkang pa la rkang pas mnan te dbab par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:414b-11: lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i yungs kar gyis bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:414b-15: lan gsum bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i me tog dmar pos bgyi'o gdon 'khungs par bgyi na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:414b-16: yid kyis bzlas brjod bgyis pas bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:414b-18: mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad nas brtsams te lag na rdo rje'i mdun du gdugs bdun dus gsum du ba ru ra'i shing gis zhugs bus la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:414b-19: sbrul khog pa brjes pa'i sreg blugs gsum sbyin sreg bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:414b-21: dbang phyug chen po'i gnas su mchis la ne'u le'u lces lan brgyad brgya sbyin sreg bgyi zhing ming nas phyung na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:414b-23: lag na rdo rje'i mdun du shu dag brgyad brgya sbyin sreg bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:415a-0: @415a *// gdong dkar mo'i cho ga rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:415a-1: rdo rje ser mo'i las rnams lags te /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:420a-14: dpag tshad stong tshun chad kyis thos par 'gyur /
