K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:420b-0: zla ba gcig zas su chu grog 'tshal zhing de'i 'og tu mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad nas zhag gsum smyung ba bgyis te lag na rdo rje mchad cing lha thams cad kyang mchod par @420b bgyi'o; ;de nas rig sngags 'chang gis lag na rdo rje'i mdun du ldong ros shing aa shvatha'i lo ma bdun gyi steng du bzhag ste dngos grub gsum byung gi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:420b-2: nam mkha' la mchi par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:420b-5: lo lnga stong thub pa'i rig sngags 'chang nyid du 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:420b-6: lo lnga stong thub pa'i rkang gis 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:420b-7: sa phyogs gang na gnod sbyin mo mchis ba der mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad nas zhag gsum smyung ba bgyis te gnas dben par mchis la dur khrod kyi shing gis zhugs bus la seng ldeng gi yum sreg zhing khrag dang dug la smyugs pa lan brgya stong sbyin sreg byis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:420b-8: gnod sbyin mo de mchi bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:420b-9: mchis nas 'di skad du ci bya zhes mchi ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:420b-10: des 'di skad du gang bsam pa de gyis shig ces brjod par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:420b-11: gal te btub na 'di skad du dpag tshad brgya nas bud med nga'i gan du khrid shog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:420b-12: grogs po brgyad cu la zan byin cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:420b-13: nyin gcig bzhin ras zung brgyad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:420b-14: karsha pa na brgyad brgyad phul cig ces brjod dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:420b-15: de ltar bgyi'o zhes mchis par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:420b-16: de'i 'go tu bud med khrid de mchi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:420b-18: yid kyis slar gtang bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:420b-19: rdo rje bzhad ma'i cho ga rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:420b-20: pho nya mo thams cad kyi las ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:421a-2: las thams cad du yang sbyar bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:421a-3: las thams cad du yang rig pa mchog gi snying po dang lhan cig sbyar bar bgyi ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:421a-4: sgrub pa ma lags pa'i rig pa yang sgrub par bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:421a-5: srin bu ka ta'i dug gis gnod bar gyur pa rnams la ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:421a-6: yi ge bri ba'i gzhi dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:421a-8: smyug gu yang sngags lan bdun bdun gyis bsngags la gang 'dod pa bris te bskur na sos par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:421a-9: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:421a-10: bcom ldan 'das; gzhan yang gang gis rig pa thams cad dngos grub tu 'gyur ba stsol ba'i rig pa'i lha thams cad kyi gsang ba brjod par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:421a-11: gal te rig sngags 'chang rig pa sgrub par 'tshal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:421a-12: rig pa'i lha de la 'dis mgu bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:421a-13: mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis te rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klung gi ngogs gnyi ga'i sa blangs la lha'i gzugs bgyis te spyin dang ma 'dres pa'i tshon gyis lha'i kha dog ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar bri bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:421a-14: mar sbrang rtsis lto dgang bar bgyi'o; ;me tog padma'i dbus su lha de gzhag par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:421a-16: aa ga ru dang tsandan gyis bsku bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:421b-0: dus gsum du bdug pas kyang bdug par @421b bgyi ste; gu gul dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:421b-3: shing sha mi'i me tog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:421b-4: de rnams bsres pa'i bdug pas bdug par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:421b-5: gdugs gsum gyi bar du bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:421b-6: de nas gzugs de 'o ma'i nang du stsal te zhig par ma gyur gyi bar du bzhag la zhig nas 'o ma rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chab kyi nang du stsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:421b-7: de nas sbyor ba 'dis lha nge mgu bar 'gyur zhing dga' ba mthong ste myur du dngos grub kyang stsol te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:421b-10: rig pa'i rigs thams cad kyang gsang ba lags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:421b-14: bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi don gyi slad du brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:421b-16: rig pa'i rgyal bo bdag gis bshad pa 'di ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:421b-17: rig sngags thams cad kyi rgyal po ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:421b-18: rig pa thams cad sgrub tu stsal ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:421b-20: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:421b-21: zla ma mchis pa lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:421b-23: bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi don gyi slad du bshad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:421b-24: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor 'dus pa la bka' stsal pa; grogs po dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:421b-25: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stobs chen po lag na rdo rje mthong ngam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:422a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:422a-4: byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje la gang gis 'di ltar yid kyis phyag 'tshal na yang des de bzhin gshegs pa stong phrag dgu la phyag byas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:422a-5: de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des lag na rdo rje'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces byang chub sems dpa' khyod de bzhin gshegs pas bstod cing bkur te bsngags pa legs so legs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:422a-6: brtson 'grus dang brtul ba chen po dang ldan pa legs so zhes bya ba smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:422a-7: de nas gzhon nu rdo rje sdes bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:422a-8: lag na rda rje la phyag 'tshal te byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:422a-10: bdag kyang rig pa mchog la dga' bas gang gis rig pa mchog sgrub pa'i rig sngags 'chang de la gnod sbyin thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:422a-16: grul bum thams cad bgegs bgyid par mi 'gyur bar sems can thams cad kyi don gyi slad du gsang sngags stsal bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:422b-0: de nas gnod sbyin @422b gyi dbang po lag na rdo rjes gzhon nu rdo rje sde la 'di skad ces smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:422b-2: khyod sems can thams cad la phan bar brtson pa legs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:422b-4: khyod rig pa mchog gi don gyi phyir gsang sngags smros shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:422b-5: de nas phas gnang bas gzhon nu rdo rje sde dga' mgu yid rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas log 'dren nges par gzhig pa'i gsang sngags smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:422b-9: na mashtsanda badzra p'a na ye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:422b-10: ma h'a yaksha se n'a pa ta ye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:422b-11: na mo badzra se n'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:422b-12: ku ma ra r'u pa dh'a ra ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:422b-13: aa pra ti ha t'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:422b-14: ma h'a ba la pa r'a kra m'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:422b-19: bi n'a ya kam bandha bandha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:422b-20: spho ta ya spho ta ya; ma ra ma ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:422b-23: tstshinda stvam mya krinta dzambha mo ha ya ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:422b-25: sgrub pa'i dus na grogs mkhar 'gyis las rdo rje bgyis te srung ba bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:422b-26: srung ba'i dus na til nag pos sbyin sreg brgya stong bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:422b-27: bgegs thams cad bcom par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:422b-28: sgrub pa'i dus na lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i yungs kar gyis mtshams gcad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:422b-29: rkang rjes kyi sa'am thal ba la lan gsum bzlas brjod bgyis te srung ba bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:423a-0: sgrub pa'i dus na 'jim pa las rdo rje'i gzugs bgyis te spos @423a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:423a-3: bdug pas mchod la rig pa lan brgya stong bzlas brjod bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:423a-4: sgrub pa'i tshe byin gyis rlob par bgyid cing dngos grub tu 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:423a-6: gu gul gyi bdug pas bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:423a-8: rdo rje'i phyag rgya bgyis la lag na rdo rje'i mdun du bzlas brjod lan brgyad brgya bgyis te gang na klu gnas pa'i mtsho der bor na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:423a-9: klu thams cad skrag par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:423a-10: dri za rnams g-yos par bgyi na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:423a-11: mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis te lag na rdo rje'i mdun du dur khrod kyi sol bas dri za'i gzugs bris la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:423a-12: de'i lto bar srin lag bzhag ste rig pa lan brgya stong brjod na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:423a-13: snying po brjod pas mchi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:423a-14: mchis nas bar snang las sman 'dor te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:423a-16: dri za thams cad kyang srung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:423a-17: gnod sbyin rnams brlag par bgyi na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:423a-18: phyogs gang na gnod sbyin nam gnod sbyin mo gnas ba'i phyogs der mchis la lcags phur sor bzhi pa blangs te lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te btsugs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:423b-0: ri mo mkhan gso sbyong bzung bas ma god pa'i ras la sangs rgyas kyi @423b gzugs gser gyi mdog can bri bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:423b-1: de'i g-yon rol du lag na rdo rje mdog sngo bsangs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:423b-2: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:423b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa'i g-yas rol du rdo rje sde gzhon nu'i gzugs 'dzin pa gser gyi mdog can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:423b-4: lag pa g-yon pa na padma /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:423b-5: g-yas pas dam pa sbyin par bri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:423b-6: de'i 'og rol du sgrub pa po lag na pog phor thogs ba bri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:423b-7: de nas rig sngags 'chang gis zla ba phyed zas su 'o skyo 'thung zhing rig pa bzlas brjod bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:423b-8: de nas mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis te rgya cher mchod la gtor ma yang rgya cher bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:423b-9: de nas rig sngags 'chang gis sna ma'i me tog brgya stong gis de bzhin gshegs pa la phog par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:423b-10: dngos grub kyi mtshan mar ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:423b-11: mar me'i me lce gyen du mchi la spu zing zhes bgyid na dngos grub tu 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:423b-12: yid kyis gang bsam pa de stsol te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:423b-16: las thams cad du yang sbyar bar bgyi ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:423b-18: rdo rje sde'i cho ga rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:423b-19: de nas mu dha da kas lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:423b-21: bdag ni khyod kyi rig sngags kyi cho ga rgyas pa thams cad la bgegs bgyid pa lags mod kyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:424a-1: mchog sgrub pa de dag la bdag slar bcing ba stsal bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:424a-3: rig sngags 'chang de la su yang bgegs bgyid par mi 'gyur ro; ;bzhin bzang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:424a-5: bdag cag bcing ba smros shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:424a-7: de nas mu dha da kas lag na rdo rje'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te bdag bcing ba'i gsang sngags smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:424a-8: na mo ratna tra ya sya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:424a-9: na mashtsanda badzra p'a ni sya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:424a-11: rdzi rdzi ru ru kha ri bi kha ri /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:424a-13: tsa la ya tsa la ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:424a-15: aa kro dha bha sha dham/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:424a-16: sma ra sma ra; bandha bandha sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:424a-17: lag na rdo rje dang; mu dha da ka'i mdun du me tog dmar po dang bdug pas mchod la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:424a-18: de nas sgrub pa'i dus na srad bu dkar po la mdud pa gsum dor ro; ;su zhig rtag tu 'chang ba de la thams cad dngos grub tu 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:424a-20: las thams cad du yang spra tshil las mu dha da ka'i gzugs bgyis te lag pa g-yon na mdung rtse gsum pa thogs par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:424a-21: de nas rig sngags 'chang gis tsandan dmar po'i mdung rtse gsum pas snying gar btsugs pa de'i 'og tu rde'u nag pos bkang ste dngos grub stsal gyi bar du gzhag par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:424b-0: de nas rig sngags 'chang gis mdung rtse gsum pa phyung la 'o mas bkrus te rig pa yang lan @424b brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis la thams cad bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:424b-1: gal te las de ltar ma bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:424b-3: mu dha da ka'i sgrub pa lags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:424b-4: ri mo mkhan gso sbyong bzung bas ma god pa'i ras la sangs rgyas kyi gzugs gser gyi kha dog can bri bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:424b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa'i g-yon rol du lag na rdo rje mdog sngo bas rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:424b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa'i g-yas rol du ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:424b-7: 'phags pa kun dga' bo gser gyi mdog can lag na rnga yab thogs pa bri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:424b-8: lag na rdo rje'i 'og logs su mu dha da ka mdog dmar la mig gsum pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:424b-10: gad mo rta skad 'byin cing lag pa g-yas pa kha 'gram du bzhag pa bri'o; ;de nas rig sngags 'chang gis mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis la ri mo'i gzugs la mchod pa rgya cher bgyis la de'i mdun du aa karsha'i shing gis zhugs bus te yungs kar dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:424b-13: 'di rnams mar dang bsres pa la lan brgya stong bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:424b-14: ri mo'i gzugs kyi me tog gi phreng ba 'gul bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:424b-17: rdo rje'i rigs thams cad kyi dngos grub tu 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:425a-2: sbrul gyis zin pa dbab na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:425a-3: sra rtsi pog gis bdug pas bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:425a-5: rkang rjes kyis lag mthil du mdung rtse gsum pa bris la bstan na gdon du zhing 'bros so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:425a-6: skyes pa dang bud med dbang du bgyi na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:425a-7: mu dha da ka la phyag bgyis la gdugs gang yang rung ste shle shme ta ka'i shing gis zhugs bus la baru ra'i me tog brgya stong sbyin sreg bgyis na dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:425a-9: dur khrod kyi thal ba dur khrod kyi ras kyis bcings la rig pa yang lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na mo mtshan bcings par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:425a-11: byis pa gdon skem byed kyis zin pa rnams ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:425a-12: chab la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te bkrus na sos par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:425a-17: a'arya mu dha da ka'i cho ga rdzogs so;; ;;de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:425a-19: bdag gis kyang lag na rdo rje la gsang sngags stsal bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:425b-0: @425b khro bo gos dkar mo'i snying po bton pa tsam gyis 'grub pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:425b-2: 'di bton pa tsam gyis sems can thams cad rengs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:425b-3: na ma:sarba ta th'a ga te bhyo /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:425b-5: aom bha ya n'a sha ne tr'a sa ne tr'a sa ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:425b-6: bhi ku ti ta ti be ta ti sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:425b-7: rig pa 'di bton pa tsam gyis bgegs thams cad bcom par 'gyur ro; ;bdag srung na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:425b-8: thal ba la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis pas bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:425b-10: spyi bor lan gsum bzlas brjod bgyis te skra mdud par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:425b-11: sems can thams cad rengs par bgyi na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:425b-14: yar gyi ngo zla ba nya la zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du byang chub kyi shing gis zhugs bus la til gyis lan brgya stong sbyin sreg bgyis na dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:425b-16: mi rus kyi phur bu blangs la lan brgya stong sngags kyis btab ste dgra'i khyim du btsugs na dgra ma rungs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:425b-18: mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la dur khrod kyi thal ba blangs te dur khrod kyi zhugs su lan brgya stong sbyin sreg bgyis na 'gum mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:426a-0: mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la chab lte ba nub tsam du zhugs la dgra'i srog bskams kyi bar du @426a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:426a-3: seng ldeng gi phur pa sor bzhi pa blangs te phur bu re re la yang lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis la phyogs bzhir btsugs na mtshams bcad par 'gyur ro //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:426a-10: sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar shing aa shvattha'i lo ma bdun gyi steng du lig bu mig dang ldong ros bzhag pa dngos grub gsum byung gi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:426a-13: rig sngags 'chang skra lcang lo 'khyil pa can du 'gyur ro //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:426b-0: khrag dang bsres la lan brgya stong sbyin sreg bgyis na yul @426b 'khor ma rungs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:426b-1: mar gyis lan brgya stong sbyin sreg bgyis na zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:426b-3: tshes grangs dang skar ma gdam mi 'tshal te /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:426b-6: rig pa bzlas brjod bgyis la gdong la byugs na rgyal bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:426b-7: khros pa'i mdun du bzlas brjod bgyis na dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:426b-8: yugs sa mo dbang du bgyi bar 'tshal bas yar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du me tog dkar po brgya stong sbyin sreg bgyid na dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:426b-10: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du du ba ma mchis pa'i me mdag la rgya skyegs kyis lan brgya stong sbyin sreg bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:426b-12: gang 'dod pa de rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:426b-13: mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor bcing na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:426b-14: yungs kar la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis pas bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:426b-15: chu srin ku mbhi ra'i kha bcing na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:426b-16: gseg ma la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis te chab tu bor na kha bcing bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:427a-0: chom rkun gyi nang du chud na bsam par @427a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:427a-1: bya'o; ;ri mo mkhan gso sbyong bzung bas ma god pa'i ras la sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs bri bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:427a-5: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:427a-7: gser gyi mdog can du bri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:427a-9: lo bcu drug tsam lon pa'i gzugs 'dra la kha dog sngo bsangs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:427a-10: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:427a-11: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug gi g-yas rol du ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:427a-13: de yang 'dam bu mda' rgyu ltar dkar ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:427a-14: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyang de dang 'dra'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:427a-16: padma'i phreng bas brgyan pa bri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:427a-17: de'i 'og rol du sgrub pa po pog phor thogs pa bri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:427a-18: sgrub pa po zla ba gcig gi bar du zas su 'o skyo 'tshal zhing yar gyi ngo tshes brgyad la mchod pa rgya chen po bgyis te lha mo la 'od zer byung gi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:427a-19: 'od zer de de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi mthe bong nub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:427a-20: de nas dngos grub tu 'gyur te /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:427b-1: dam pa gang blangs pa de rnyed de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:427b-4: tha mar zhag gsum smyung ba bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:427b-5: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug gi cho ga rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:427b-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:427b-8: ngas kyang gang gis rdo rje'i rigs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:427b-9: cho ga rgyas pa chen po gzhan dag kyang 'grub par 'gyur pa'i gsang sngags kyi cho ga rgyas pa 'dir sbyin par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:427b-11: cho ga rgyas pa thams cad du 'di gcig pu sbar bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:427b-13: 'di dran pa tsam gyis rig pa'i lha thams cad mngon du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:427b-14: na ma sarba ta th'a ga te bhyo bha ga badhya:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:427b-15: aom ru ru spu ru dzva la tishtha siddha lo tsa ne sarba aartha s'a dha ni sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:427b-18: sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag bcus dgongs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:427b-19: ngas kyang da ltar sems can rnams kyi don dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:427b-20: khro bo rnams dga' bar bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:427b-21: gdul dka' ba rnams 'dul ba'i phyir bshad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:427b-22: ri mo mkhan gso sbyong dang ldan pas ma god pa'i ras la sbyin dang ma 'dres pa'i tshon gyis sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs gser gyi mdog can chos ston pa bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:428a-1: lag na rdo rje mdog sngo bsangs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:428a-2: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa chos nyan pa bri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:428a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa'i g-yon rol du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'dam bu mda' rgyu ltar dkar ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:428a-4: skra'i thor tshugs dang cod pan can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:428a-5: stag lpags kyi sham thabs gyon pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:428a-6: lag na rnga yang thogs pa bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:428a-7: de nas zla ba phyed zas su 'o skyo 'thung zhing rig pa bzlas brjod bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:428a-8: des mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis te ri mo'i gzugs la mchod pa rgya cher byas la rig pa lan brgya stong bzlas brjod bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:428a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa'i glo g-yas nas 'od zer byung ste lag na rdo rje la nub na 'grub par 'gyur re //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:428a-12: dam pa gnyis sbyin par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:428a-13: rgyal po nyid du gyur na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:428a-14: rig sngags 'chang rnams kyi 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro; ;rig sngags 'chang nyid du gyur na ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:428a-15: rig sngags 'chang drug khri'i bdag po nyi ma shar ba lta bu'i mdog can lo bcu drug lon pa lta bu'i lus su 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:428a-16: lo khri bzhi stong thub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:428a-17: sems can thams cad kyi skad shes par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:428b-0: slong mo'i zas bza' zhing ri'i rtse mor ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi @428b drung du me tog dkar po zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:428b-2: mar la smyugs pa 'bum sbyin sreg bya zhing lan 'bum bzlas brjod byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:428b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs mngon sum du 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:428b-4: mthong nas gang sgrub pa de 'grub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:428b-5: su zhig rtag tu lan gsum brjod cing phyag kyang 'tshal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:428b-6: des de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag bcu la bsti stang byas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:428b-10: gang gi tshe shi ba de'i tshe bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:428b-11: mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba byas te bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas la tsandan dkar pos dkyil 'khor byugs te rig pa lan brgya stong bzlas brjod byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:428b-12: de nas dngos grub tu 'gyur ro //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:428b-14: mig la lan bdun bsngags na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:428b-15: gang mthong ba de dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:428b-16: lag na rdo rje'i mdun du ldong ros la lan brgyad brgya bzlas brjod byas nas mig la bskus na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:428b-17: gang mthong ba de dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:428b-18: rkang rjes kyis blangs la lan bdun sngags kyis btab ste bud med gang gi mgo bor gtor na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:428b-20: bdag gi mchil ma lan bdun bsngags te thig le byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:428b-21: gang mthong ba de dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:429a-1: gi ming nas brjod de yungs kar la lan brgyad brgya sbyin sreg byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:429a-3: bud med dbang du bya na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:429a-4: til nag po las lan brgyad brgya sbyin sreg bya zhing ming nas kyang brjod na de dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:429a-5: krishna tsa tu ra da shye na shve ta /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:429a-6: phushna na ma aashta sa ha sra ne /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:429a-7: badzra p'a ni ra ha na ta pa sya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:429a-8: r'a dza pa da ni ya sho ba ti /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:429a-9: ldong ros kyis lag mthil du gzugs bris la ming nas brjod cing nyi ma la bltas te lan brgyad brgya bzlas brjod byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:429a-11: dur khrod kyi sol ba blangs te rtsig ngos la gzugs bris la mo mtshan gyi steng du mdzub mo bzhag ste lan brgyad brgya bzlas brjod byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:429a-13: spra tshil la gzugs byas te ldan pa g-yas par bzhag la lan brgyad brgya bzlas brjod byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:429a-18: rgya spos rnams bsres te btags la rig pa lan brgya stong bzlas brjod byas te zas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:429a-20: bza' ba'i nang du btab na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:429a-22: dur khrod kyi thal ba blangs la lag na rdo rje'i mdun du lan brgyad brgya bzlas brjod byas te gang la gtor ba de dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:429b-0: lag na rdo rje'i mdun du me tog dkar po brgyad @429b brgya gtor na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:429b-2: dur khrod kyi sol ba blangs te rtsig ngos la gzugs bris la shing k'a ra b'i ra'i me tog brgya rtsa brgyad mo mtshan du phog par byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:429b-4: ba lang gi lci ba sa la ma lhung ba blangs te zhi ba'i mtshan gcig byas la de'i mdun du rtsva ku sha las mdung rtse gsum byas pas nyi ma gsum du yungs kar dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:429b-6: sbrang rtsi bsres pa'i sreg blugs lan bdun bdun sbyin sreg byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:429b-8: lag na rdo rje'i mdun du ldum bu ba sha ka'i yam sreg shing brgyad brgya sbyin sreg byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:429b-10: gzhon nu ma dbang du bya na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:429b-11: aa rang ga na'i me tog brgya stong gis lag na rdo rje la phog par byas na gzhon nu ma dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:429b-12: yugs sa mo dbang du bya na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:429b-13: lag na rdo rje'i mdun du mon sran gre'u sbyin sreg bya zhing ming nas kyang brjod na dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:429b-14: thal ba la lan bdun sngags kyis btab ste bud med la gtor na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:429b-16: bud med kyi mdun du rig pa lan brgyad brgya bzlas brjod byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:429b-18: shing bu sor bzhi pa blangs te g-yab na 'ong zhing dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:430a-0: me tog dkar po blangs te lag na rdo rje'i mdun du lan brgya stong bzlas brjod byas la bud med mthong bar g-yab na 'ong zhing dbang du @430a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:430a-3: bu mo gtsang mas bkal ba'i skud pa brkyang nas blangs te lag na rdo rje'i mdun du nyis khugs dang bzhi khugs byas pa bzhag la bzlas brjod byas te gcig la gcig 'khril na dgongs pa 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:430a-4: ge'u wang sgrub par 'dod pas nyi ma bdun du zas su 'o skyo 'thung zhing yar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba byas te lag na rdo rje la mchod pa rgya cher byas la gi'u wang padma'i steng du bzhag ste 'bar gyi bar du bzlas brjod bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:430a-6: blangs pa tsam gyis nyi ma shar ba lta bu'i mdog dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:430a-7: dgos pa thams cad yid kyis bsam pa tsam gyis 'byung bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:430a-8: rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyis mi sod par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:430a-9: lo dgu stong thub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:430a-10: zla ba phyed zas su 'o skyo 'thung zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:430a-11: de nas rig sngags 'chang gis grog mkhar gyis las nor rgyas kyi gzugs byas la de'i steng du 'dug ste nam 'gul bar gyur gyi bar du rig sngags lan 'bum bzlas brjod byas na longs spyod ster ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:430a-14: da ltar byung ba rnams ston par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:430b-0: lo lnga brgya thub par @430b 'gyur; bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:430b-1: zas su 'o skyo 'thung zhing lag na rdo rje'i mdun du lan 'bum bzlas brjod byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:430b-3: zla ba gcig gi bar du slong mo'i zas bza' zhing yar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis te lag na rdo rje la mched pa byas nas bcom ldan 'das la yang lhag par mchod de lag na rdo rje'i rkang pa nas bzung la rig sngags bzlas brjod byas te lag na rdo rje'i gzugs 'gul bar gyur gyi bar du bzlas brjod bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:430b-5: grub ba thams cad kyis mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:430b-6: yid kyis bsam pas kha zas 'byung bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:430b-7: lo lnga stong thub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:430b-8: de nas gnod sbyin gyi dbang po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:430b-9: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag sems can rnams kyi don gyi slad du gsang sngags 'di lta bu gsungs pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:430b-10: ngo mtshar to zhes gsol nas 'khor thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:430b-11: sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyi cho ga rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:431a-0: de nas 'byung po'i bdag po dbang ldan gyis bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad @431a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:431a-4: rig pa thams cad kyi gtso mo lags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:431a-5: 'di dran pa tsam gyis bdag gis dngos grub stsal bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:431a-7: bdag gis kyang sems can rnams kyi don gyi slad du byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje la ming dbul bar 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:431a-10: de nas 'byung po'i bdag po dbang ldan gyis lag na rdo rje'i zhabs gnyis la btugs nas lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so; ;gsang ba'i bdag po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:431a-11: khyod kyis rig sngags chen po'i ming 'di bzhes su gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:431a-12: na mo ru tr'a ya le le /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:431a-15: lig bu mig bud med kyi skras bcings la rgya mtsho 'bab pa'i chu klung gi ngos gnyis ka'i 'jim pa blangs pa'i nang du bcug ste bsregs la dbang phyug chen po'i gnas su song nas mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad dam bcu bzhi la zhag gcig smyung ba byas te lig bu mig blangs la lan brgya stong bzlas brjod byas nas sbyang bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:431a-16: mig la bskus na gang la bltas pa de dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:431a-17: mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la dur khrod kyi sol ba blangs te mi'i thod pa la brdar nas lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas pas thig le byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:431b-0: gang @431b la bltas pa de dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:431b-1: sol ba yang bsgrub par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:431b-2: zhag bdun gyi bar du zas su chu dang phye'i 'dag gu za zhing mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis te dur khrod du song la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:431b-3: de nas thag bu la skyang nul ba ko tsam byas te mchod pa chen po byas nas dur khrod kyi sol ba blangs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:431b-4: de nas rig sngags 'chang gis sol ba mi'i thod pa'i nang du bzhag la lag pas mnan te dud par 'thul bar gyur gyi bar du rig sngags bzlas brjod byas nas blangs te thig le byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:431b-6: bsam pas kyang kha zas 'byung bar byed de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:431b-7: tshe lo stong thub par 'gyur la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:431b-8: dbang phyug chen po'i las rnams bklags pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:431b-9: tshes grangs dang skar ma yang gdam mi 'tshal /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:431b-10: smyung ba yang bgyi mi 'tshal bar bud med shi ba'i ro blangs la dri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:431b-12: de'i mo mtshan du til gyi lo ma bzhag nas de'i steng du ldong ros srang gcig gam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:431b-13: srang phyed bzhag la 'bar bar gyur gyi bar du rig sngags bzlas brjod byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:431b-14: 'bar bar gyur na dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs dang ldan par 'gyur zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:431b-15: rab tu 'joms pa'i tshogs kyis bskor la lo dgu stong thub cing dbang phyug chen po'i tshogs rnams dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:432a-0: @432a *// dur khrod kyi thal ba blangs te mi'i thod pa'i snod du bzhag la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:432a-1: mtshan gcig 'dug pa'i gnas su song nas zhag gsum smyud ba byas te mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la 'byung po'i gtor ma yang byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:432a-2: de nas thod pa'i snod lag tu blangs te dngos grub rnam gsum du gyur gyi bar du bzlas brjod byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:432a-3: dud pa 'thul bas ni; lus mi snang bar 'gyur zhing tshe lo brgya stong thub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:432a-6: skra lcang lo 'khyil bar 'gyur zhing nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:432a-7: tshe lo lnga stong thub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:432a-8: gi wang sgrub par 'dod pas ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:432a-9: mar gyi ngo zhag gcig smyung ba byas te lag na rdo rje'i mdun du mchod pa byas la lag na rdo rje'i lag tu gi'u wang bzhag nas 'bar bar gyur gyi bar du bzlas brjod byas te 'bar bar gyur na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:432a-10: blangs pa tsam gyis stobs glang po che dang mnyam zhing pha rol gyi mtshon gyis kyang mi tshugs la tshe lo sum stong thub par 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:432a-11: gang gtam byas pa de dbang du 'gyur zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:432a-12: dbang phyug chen po'i g-yog rnams kyis nyin gcig bzhin ti na ra bcu gnyis dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:432a-13: gos phrugs bcu gnyis sbyin par bgyid cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:432a-14: sngon ma byung ba'i bud med kyang khrid de 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:432b-0: dbang phyug chen po'i cho @432b ga rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:432b-1: de nas ma tang+gi rgyal po phur bu gsum pas lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:432b-3: bdag gis kyang sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir mig dbul bar bgyis te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:432b-4: 'di dran pa tsam gyis bdag gi cho ga rgyas pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:432b-5: de nas ma tang gi rgyal po phur bu gsum pas bcom ldan 'das dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:432b-6: lag na rdo rje'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas gsang sngags smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:432b-7: na mo badzra p'a ni sya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:432b-8: ma h'a yaksha se n'a pa ti sya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:432b-9: na ma: na ma: tri sha karma tam gardza sya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:432b-18: yar gyi ngo tshes brgyad kyi srod la dkyil 'khor skyang nul gyis byugs nas phur bu gsum pa la dri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:432b-20: bdug pa phul te bcom ldan 'das dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:432b-21: lag na rdo rje la bdug pa gsol nas zhag gcig smyung ba byas te rig sngags lan brgya stong bzlas brjod byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:432b-23: de'i 'og tu las brtsam par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:432b-24: bud med dbang du bya na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:432b-25: tshes grangs dang rgyu skar yang gdam mi dgos /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:432b-26: smyung ba yang bya mi dgos par k'a ra b'i ra'i yam sreg shing gis ming nas smos shing brgya stong gis sbyin sreg byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:433a-1: 'khor skyang nul gyis byugs la lan tshva las gzugs byas nas mtshon rnon pos rkang pa nas brtsams te bcad cing dud pa med pa'i 'dab ma la lan brgyad brgya sbyin sreg byas na yang dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:433a-2: yar gyi ngo tshes lnga la yang mi'i rus pa'i phur bu sa la btab ste de'i steng du mar me sbar la mar me de'i me lce 'bar ba la nim pa'i lo ma khab kyis btsugs te ming nas smos shing brgyad brgya sbyin sreg byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:433a-4: yar gyi tshes bcu gsum la ras bal gyi 'dab ma rgya skyegs kyis kha dog bsgyur ba sred med kyi bu'i chung ma la phul ba las mar me'i snying po byas te mar me sbar la k'a ra b'i ra'i me tog khab kyis btsugs te brgya stong sbyin sreg byas na yang dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:433a-5: yar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la zhag gcig smyung ba byas te aa ti mukta ka'i me tog brgya stong gis dka' zlog ma'i mo mtshan la bsnun na yang grong dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:433a-6: longs spyod kyi gzhi sbyin par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:433a-7: mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la zhag gcig smyung ba byas te aa rang ga na'i me tog gis dka' zlog ma'i rkang pa la bsnun na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:433a-9: bud med dbang du bya na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:433a-10: lag na rdo rje'i mdun du me tog dkar po brgyad brgya phul na dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:433b-0: yar gyi ngo zhag lnga la zhag gcig @433b smyung ba byas te kam po dza 'i shing gis me sbar la ko sha ta ka'i me tog brgya stong gis ming nas smos shing sbyin sreg byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:433b-2: dka' zlog ma'i 'o mas bkrus la rig sngags kyang stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:433b-4: phur bu gsum pa'i cho ga rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:433b-5: de nas nam mkha' la rgyu ba'i ma mo bdun gyis ca co dang ga zha'i sgra bton nas 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'khor 'dus pa de dag thams cad la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:433b-7: bdag cag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje la gsang sngags kyi shas 'bul bar 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:433b-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ma mo de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:433b-10: gang khyed sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa ni; legs so legs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:433b-11: de nas ma mo de dag gis tshig mthun par lag na rdo rje la gsang sngags phul ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:433b-13: na mo badzra p'a na ye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:433b-14: ma h'a yaksha se n'a pa ta ye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:433b-15: tadya th'a; hu lu hu lu /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:433b-22: ma tsa me kha shtsid beghnam ka ri shya ti /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:433b-23: mo ha ni mo ha ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:433b-25: m'a li ni bi shve shva re /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:434a-2: rig sngags 'di dran pa tsam gyis rig pa mchog sgrub pa'i rig sngags 'chang de la bdag cag ma mo bdun gyis dpag tshad gcig gi bar du bsrung bar bgyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:434a-3: yang dag par so sor bskyab par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:434a-4: rig sngags kyi las rnams 'byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:434a-5: ras gsar pa la sbyin dang ma 'dres pa'i tshon rtsis lag na rdo rje mdog sngo bsangs la lo bcu drug lon pa'i sha gzugs can rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:434a-6: ma mo bdun gyis bskor ba bri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:434a-8: 'jigs pa'i tshul du bsgrub par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:434a-9: de nas zhag gsum smyung ba byas te mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la ci nus kyis mchod pa byas te chang dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:434a-10: sha'i gtor ma yang sbyin par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:434a-11: de nas rig sngags 'chang gis ri mo'i sku gzugs kyi mdun du seng ldeng gi shing gis me sbar la yungs kar khrag gis bsgos pas lan brgya stong sbyin sreg byas te de nas ri mo'i sku gzugs 'gul bar mthong na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:434a-12: rig sngags 'chang gi rig pa mchog dran par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:434a-13: bud med mche ba gtsigs pa yang 'ong bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:434a-14: des 'jigs par mi bya bar sring mo khyod 'ongs pa legs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:434a-15: rdo rje 'dzin gyis dam tshig byin pa gang yin pa de dran par gyis shig ces smros shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:434b-0: de skad thos nas ca co'i sgra phyung ste de bzhin @434b du bya'o zhes nas mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:434b-1: de nas nyin gcig bzhin du ti na ra re sbyin bar byed cing don thams cad sgrub ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:434b-2: rig sngags kyi dngos grub kyang sbyin par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:434b-4: log 'dren phung bar bya ba la ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:434b-6: lan tshva sbyin sreg lan brgyad brgya bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:434b-8: skra gtubs pa'i bdug pas bdugs na gdon thams cad 'jigs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:434b-11: lo tog ma rungs par bya ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:434b-12: mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la ni aa 'bra'i shing gi phur bu sor brgyad pa blangs te lag na rdo rje'i mdun du lan brgyad brgya bzlas brjod byas nas zhing la btab na lo tog med par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:434b-13: chang ma rung bar bya na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:434b-14: 'o ma'i sreg blugs la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg byas na ma rung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:434b-15: dgra lus mi sdug par bya na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:434b-16: lam gyi sum mdor skyu ru ra'i shing gis me sbar te dgra'i ming nas smos shing dug gis lan brgya stong sbyin sreg byas na dgra'i lus la mi gtsang ba'i dri mnam par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:434b-18: lag na rdo rje la mchod pa rgyas par byas te mar dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:434b-19: gu gul gyis lan stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na phyir 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:435a-0: mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la zhag gcig smyung ba @435a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:435a-1: byas te lag na rdo rje'i mdun du spen ma'i shing gis me sbar la phub mas lan brgya stong sbyin srag byas na dbye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:435a-2: dgra bskrad par 'dod pas ni; mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la ne'u le'i rus pa blangs nas dgra'i ming nas smos te sbrul gyi khung bur btsugs na de ma thag tu dgra 'bros par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:435a-3: rig pa mchog sgrub pa'i rig sngags 'chang gi cho ga rgyas pa las 'byung ba'i lha rnams la mchod pa byas la btsugs nas byung na yang rtag tu bcing bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:435a-4: de bcings na; cho ga rgyas par 'grub par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:435a-5: rig sngags kyi dngos grub las su yang glags tshol bar mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:435a-6: gang la rig pa mchog gi cho ga rgyas pa thams cad rdzogs pa yod pa de thams cad la ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:435a-7: lha rnams yid dga' bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:435a-8: rig sngags kyang sbyin par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:435a-10: lag na rdo rje'i bya ba sgrub pa rnams glags tshol ba'i phyir 'khod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:435a-11: cho ga rgyas pa sgrub pas cho ga rgyas pa las bshad pa bzhin du 'gal ba rnams bsrung bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:435a-16: dge 'dun la mngon par dga' bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:435a-17: gang dag nga'i rdo rje'i rigs la mchod pa byed cing dang bar byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:435b-0: rig pa'i mchog @435b 'don cing mchod pa de dag ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:435b-1: nga'i dam tshig shes pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:435b-3: nga la shas cher dang ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:435b-4: de dag la nga zhi bar sems so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:435b-5: lha thams cad kyang zhi bar sems par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:435b-6: gang dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul las phyi rol du gyur cing 'dod do cog za ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:435b-7: dge sbyong du mi 'dzin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:435b-8: bram zer mi 'dzin par cho ga rgyas pa 'di sgrub pa de dag ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:435b-9: lag na rdo rje 'dzin gyis rdo rjes bshig par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:435b-10: lha thams cad kyang ma dad pa'i sems su 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:435b-11: log 'dren rnams kyang glags lta zhing klan ka tshol ba'i phyir 'khod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:435b-12: de ma thag tu nad kyis 'debs shing log 'dren rnams kyis non par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:435b-13: ma mo rnams kyi cho ga rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:435b-14: de nas rdo rje khro bo bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyis 'khor 'dus pa thams cad la glang po che'i lta stangs kyis bltas nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:435b-15: bcom ldan 'das; 'di'i sems can rnams ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:435b-17: tshul la mi gnas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:435b-18: pha la ma gus pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:435b-19: ma la ma gus pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:435b-24: rtag tu zang zing la brkam pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:435b-27: sha za rnams kyis zin pa lags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:436a-0: @436a *// bgegs dang log 'dren de dag gzhig pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:436a-1: mthar gtugs pa'i slad du gsang sngags bshad par 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:436a-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje khro bo la bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:436a-4: gang khyod sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa legs so legs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:436a-5: khyod la de bzhin gshegs pas gnang gi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:436a-6: sems can thams cad kyi phyir gsang sngags shod cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:436a-7: de nas rdo rje khro bo bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyis bcom ldan 'das dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:436a-8: lag na rdo rje'i zhabs la gtugs nas gsang sngags bshad pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:436a-9: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:436a-10: na mashtsanda badzra p'a na ye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:436a-11: ma h'a yaksha se n'a pa ta ye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:436a-12: na mo badzra kro dh'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:436a-13: pra dzva li ta d'i pta damshto ta ka ta bha ya bhee ra b'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:436a-15: badzra ba ra shu p'a sha ha st'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:436a-20: kh'a na kh'a na kh'a na kh'a na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:436a-21: kh'a da kh'a da kh'a da kh'a da /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:436a-22: kh'a hi kh'a hi kh'a hi kh'a hi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:436a-30: bi spho ta ya bi spho ta ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:436a-33: m'urta na t'a da ya badzre na sarba bighn'am bi n'a ya kam ni b'a ra ya ma h'a ga na pa ti /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:436a-34: dz'i bi t'anta ka r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:436a-36: aom kro dha ga na ye sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:436a-37: bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi gsang sngags dang po'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:436b-0: na mo ratna tra @436b y'a ya; na mashtsanda badzra p'a na ye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:436b-1: ma h'a yaksha se n'a pa ta ye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:436b-2: na mo ma h'a badzra kro dha ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:436b-3: damshto ta ka ta bhee ra b'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:436b-4: aa si mu sa la pa ra shu b'a sha na ha st'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:436b-7: dha ba dha ba; kha kha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:436b-15: dz'i bi ta aanta ka r'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:436b-17: na m'o ratna tra ya ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:436b-18: na ma shtsanda badzra p'a na ye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:436b-19: ma h'a yaksha se n'a pa ta ye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:436b-20: na mo badzra kro dh'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:436b-21: bi ma la ka na ka dzva bu sha na ya ga ga na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:436b-22: aa mri ta sam bha b'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:436b-23: garta ma lya aa nu le /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:436b-25: badzra p'a ni pri y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:436b-27: bha ga ya de ba n'a ga yaksha r'aksha sa pra marda n'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:436b-30: sha ta sya n+ya bi tra ka ra ya hri da nan /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:436b-31: garbho tta m'a ya aa mri ta kunda li /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:436b-32: ai hye hi damshtro ta ka ta bhee ra ba ghi bi tud dzva la spu lim ka sha ni du le ru pho ti ti sam buddha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:436b-38: bi spho ta ya bi spho ta ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:436b-41: pra dzva la pra dzva la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:436b-43: sarba bighn'am bi n'a ya k'a n'an hri da yam spa ta /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:436b-44: gandha rba hri da yam spa ta /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:436b-45: r'aksha sa hri da yam spa ta /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:436b-46: sarba dzva ra hri da yam spa ta /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:436b-47: sarba tsa tu ka hri da yam spa ta /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:436b-48: sarba n'a g'a n'am hri da yam spa ta /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:436b-52: a'a bi sha a'a bi sha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:436b-53: ai dam tsa me k'aryam ku ru badzra dha ra a'adzny'a pa ya ti sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:437a-0: @437a *// na mo badzra kro dh'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:437a-1: damshtrota ka ta bhee ra b'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:437a-8: khro bo bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi gsang sngags bzhi pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:437a-9: de nas 'di dag gi snying po don yod pa gang 'dod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:437a-10: bzlas brjod byas shing bsgrubs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:437a-11: bdag gi gsang sngags thams cad bton cing bzlas brjod bgyis pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:437a-12: bsgrubs par gyur pa de bshad par 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:437a-14: bdag gi snying po lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:437a-15: aom aa mri te h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:437a-16: bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi snying po rdo rje khro bo bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyis gsang sngags rnams bshad ma thag tu sa chen po 'di rnam pa drug tu g-yos so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:437a-17: lo ga 'dren rnams kyang skrag ste skyabs med cing rten med par gyur nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i thad du song ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:437a-19: bdag cag gi skyabs mdzad du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:437a-20: bde bar gshegs pa; bdag cag gi skyabs mdzad du gsol zhes de skad du smra zhing mgo bo thur du gtugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:437a-21: kye kye log 'dren ma rungs pa rnams longs la nga'i ngag nyon cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:437a-22: rdo rje kun tu 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:437a-23: kun tu rab tu 'bar bas khyed kyi spyi bo gshags sa re /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:437b-0: ngas ral pa ser po can rnams kyi gsang sngags kyis lha'i lo stong @437b ge bar du log 'dren rnams bcom pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:437b-4: bskams pa gang yin pa de dran par gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:437b-7: pha rol gnon pa chen po dran par gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:437b-8: gang nga'i gsang sngags 'dzin cing 'don pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:437b-10: des srung bar byed pa de la glags ma tshol cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:437b-12: zas ngan pa za yang rung /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:437b-14: grong gi chom rkun spyod kyang rung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:437b-15: rig pa'i mchog la sogs pa rig pa thams cad sgrub pa la glags ma tshol cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:437b-16: zan za ba'i tshe yang kham dang po la sngags kyis btab ste dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:437b-17: nyi ma shar ba'i tshe lan bdun brjod na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:437b-18: de'i phyi bzhin du rtag tu 'brang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:437b-19: log 'dren rnams kyang glags mi tshol lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:437b-26: la phug kyang rung ste thams cad zar zin kyang rig sngags 'dzin na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:437b-27: de la thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:437b-28: gang nga'i gsang sngags 'dzin pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:437b-29: bza' ba ma yin pa za zhing bya ba ma yin pa byed du zin kyang de la gang gis log 'dren rnams glags tshol ba brtun te 'khod par mi 'gyur ba'i gsang sngags bde ba bstan par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:438a-0: rig sngags 'chang sgrub pa na gang du log 'dren rnams kyis @438a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:438a-1: glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ba'i gnas kyang bstan par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:438a-2: nges par byas pa la ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:438a-3: glags tshol ba la brtun par mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:438a-4: nges par gnas pa la yang gnas nas gnas su 'gro ba na gom pa re re la log 'dren rnams glags tshol ba'i phyir 'khod pa yod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:438a-5: log 'dren sa'i spyi phud ces bya ba gang dag sa brtol nas 'byung ba yang yod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:438a-6: de la bgegs kyi mtshan ma yang bshad par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:438a-8: gom pa re re 'dzin par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:438a-11: le lo skye bar 'gyur zhing brgyal ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:438a-15: bsod nams kyang zad par byed de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:438a-16: log 'dren rnams kyis reg pa tsam gyis lha'i lo stong gi bar du pha rol tu phyin pa drug bsags pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po yang thal bar rlog par byed cing rig sngags 'chang rig sngags sgrub pa'i bsod nams zad par byed do /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:438a-17: de nas rig sngags rnams 'grub par mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:438a-19: rig sngags 'chang gi lus kyi lci yang las shes par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:438a-20: mar dang sra rtsi pog gis bdag nyid bdug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:438a-21: de nas log 'dren de dag gis gtong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:438a-22: gang nga'i gsang sngags 'dzin pa de la ni glags tshol bar brtun par mi 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:438b-0: @438b rig sngags 'chang gis rig pa'i mchog dran par byas na de mnyes par gyur pas 'dzum pa'i bzhin gyis dngos grub myur du 'byin par byed de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:438b-1: log 'dren rnams kyis ma mthong ba 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:438b-2: log 'dren sa'i spyi phud ces bya ba rnams kyi mtshan nyid rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:438b-3: log 'dren chu ltar g-yo ba zhes bya ba de dag ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:438b-5: rig sngags 'chang khrus byed pa na 'dzin par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:438b-6: de dag gi mtshan ma 'byung ste sems 'khrug par byed de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:438b-7: 'dod pa la lhur sems pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:438b-8: bru bas gzir cing kha zas la mngon par chags pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:438b-11: rig sngags 'chang gis bdud rtsi thab sbyor dran par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:438b-12: dran pa tsam gyis log 'dren rnams 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:438b-13: de nas rig sngags 'chang gis snying rje'i sems bskyed par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:438b-14: rig pa mchog dran par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:438b-15: de dran pa tsam gyis 'bras bu che bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:438b-16: rig sngags kyi lha de dag gis log 'dren rnams myos par mthong nas dga' ba'i sems kyis dngos grub myur du sbyin par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:438b-17: log 'dren chu ltar g-yo ba zhes bya ba rnams kyi mtshan nyid rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:438b-18: log 'dren rig sngags kyi lha'i mngag gzhug pa zhes bya ba rnams ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:439a-1: sngags las ldang ba na 'dzin par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:439a-2: zin par gyur na lus kyi tshul las rtogs par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:439a-6: de nas rig sngags 'chang gis de dag phyir gzhil bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:439a-7: gtsug phud la 'chang la bdug pa thams cad sbyin zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:439a-8: rig sngags lan brgya stong bzlas brjod byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:439a-9: phyin chad log 'dren de dag glags tshol ba la brtun par mi 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:439a-10: dga' bar gyur nas dngos grub kyang sbyin par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:439a-11: log 'dren 'di dag kyang rig sngags kyi lha thams cad kyi phyi bzhin 'brang zhing gnas pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:439a-12: rtag tu glags tshol ba yang yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:439a-15: su mchod pa byed pas de la bgegs kyang byed cing 'dun pa zlog par byed /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:439a-16: le lo yang 'jug par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:439a-18: rig sngags 'chang gis nyi ma logs su kha bltas la rtag tu chu khyor gang gtor nas khro bo'i rig sngags kyang lan bdun brjod par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:439a-19: 'di skad du bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba'i rig sngags che ge mo zhes bya ba sgrub kyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:439a-20: khyed yid dga' bar gyis shig ces kyang smros shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:439b-0: dus thams cad du de skad smras nas des log 'dren rnams dga' zhing mgu la yid dga' @439b par gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:439b-1: dngos grub sbyin par byed cing sems kyang dang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:439b-2: grub pa'i tshe yang nang par nyi ma logs su kha bltas la thal mo sbyar nas rig sngags brjod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:439b-3: 'di skad du bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i rig sngags cha ge mo zhig sgrub kyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:439b-4: khyed yid dga' bar gyis shig ces kyang smros shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:439b-5: de nas gtsug phud 'phyang la la sogs pa log 'dren de dag de nyid du 'du bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:439b-6: rig sngags 'chang gis khro bar byas la khyed ma 'gul cig ces smros shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:439b-7: de nas log 'dren de dag bcings shing gzir bar gyur te dngos grub myur du sbyin par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:439b-10: log 'dren lha'i mngag gzhug ces bya ba rnams kyi mtshan nyid rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:439b-11: log 'dren 'jig rten me tog ces bya ba rnams ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:439b-12: gang gi tshe rig sngags 'chang rig sngags sgrub cing lha la me tog dbul ba na de'i tshe log 'dren de dag gis 'dzin par byed de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:439b-13: log 'dren de dag nyid kyang me tog gi khongs su 'jug cing gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:439b-14: de bas na rig sngags 'chang gis thog ma nyid du me tog de dag rig sngags 'chang bzlas brjod byed bzhin du blang bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:439b-15: blangs nas gu gul gyi bdug pas bdugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:439b-16: de nas lha la phul na lha rnams yid dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:440a-0: bdug pas ma bdugs par lha @440a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:440a-1: de dag la log 'dren rnams kyis gnod par 'gyur te 'grub par mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:440a-2: log 'dren 'jig rten me tog ces bya ba rnams kyi mtshan nyid rdzogs so;; ;;log 'dren zas su dri za ba zhes bya ba de dag ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:440a-3: rig sngags 'chang dri la reg pa na 'dzin par byed de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:440a-4: ci ste rig sngags 'chang gis dri dag lha la phul na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:440a-5: lha de dag sems dang ba med cing rgyab kyis phyogs par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:440a-6: log 'dren de rnams mthong bas 'phang bar 'gyur zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:440a-7: rig sngags 'chang la 'grub par mi 'gyur ro; ;de bas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:440a-8: rig sngags 'chang gis thog ma nyid du khro bo'i bzlas brjod byed bzhin du dri blang bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:440a-9: des na log 'dren de dag 'byer te rmas par yang 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:440a-10: de nas lha de dag dris tshim par byas pas dga' ba'i sems kyis dngos grub stsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:440a-11: log 'dren zas su dri za ba rnams kyi mtshan nyid rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:440a-12: log 'dren nag po zhes bya ba rnams ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:440a-14: gang gi tshe rig sngags 'chang lha la bdug pa 'bul ba na de'i tshe 'dzin par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:440a-15: log 'dren gyis zin pa'i mtshan nyid ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:440b-0: bdug pa mthong bas lha 'phang bar 'gyur zhing dngos grub 'grub par mi 'gyur @440b ro; ;de bas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:440b-1: rig sngags 'chang gis thog ma nyid du lag pa g-yon pas mar blangs la kham phor gyi nang nas bdug pa phul na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:440b-2: de phyin chad log 'dren rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:440b-3: bdug pa des kyang lha thams cad tshim par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:440b-4: lha des kyang dngos grub myur du sbyin par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:440b-6: zas su dri za ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:440b-8: nag po zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:440b-9: log 'dren gtsug phud gcig pa zhes bya ba rnams ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:440b-10: mthu che zhing brtson 'grus che ba ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:440b-11: log 'dren des kyang mar me'i me lce nyid las 'byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:440b-12: de bas na rig sngags 'chang gis thog ma nyid du 'di ltar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:440b-13: ras dkar po las snying po byas te mar me gnyis sbar nas rig sngags bzlas brjod byed bzhin du kha thur du bstan te bzhag la rig sngags kyang lan brgyad brgya brjod na log 'dren thams cad kha thur du bltas te 'khod par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:440b-14: rigs sngags kyang bde blag tu 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:440b-15: sgrub pa thams cad la yang thog ma nyid du las de dag bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:440b-16: log 'dren gtsug phud gcig pa zhes bya ba rnams kyi mchan nyid rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:440b-18: gang su log 'dren rnams 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:441a-0: gang du rig sngags 'chang rnams kyi dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur ba'i @441a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:441a-1: log 'dren rnams kyi gnas bdag gis bshad lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:441a-3: log 'dren thams cad kyi srog mthar thug par bgyi ba'i las 'di yang bshad par 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:441a-4: bsgrubs pa'i rig sngags 'chang gis rdo rje khro bo'i dkyil 'khor skyang nul gyis byugs la k'a ra b'i ra'i shing gis me sbar la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:441a-5: k'a ra b'i ra'i me tog dag gi khrag gi nang du smyugs pa'i sreg blugs nyi shu rtsa gcig gis sbyin sreg bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:441a-6: las de byas nas log 'dren thams cad bcing ngo zhes brjod na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:441a-8: log 'dren thams cad kyi mthar thug par gyis shig ces brjod na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:441a-10: bcings pa las bkrol na yang yid kyis bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:441a-13: lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pa'i chus mgo bor blugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:441a-15: lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas pa'i seng ldeng gi phur bus bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:441a-17: ha ha zhes bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:441a-18: gu gul gyi bdug pas bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:441a-19: dug las gso bar bya na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:441a-20: se gol lam yal gas bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:441a-22: me tog dkar po la lan bdun bzlas brjod bya ba'am gu gul gyis bdug pas bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:441b-1: mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la zhag gcig smyung ba byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:441b-2: rdo rje khro bo'i dkyil 'khor skyang nul gyis byugs nas pri yang ku'i shing gis me sbar te phub ma'i sbyin sreg lan brgya stong byas na zhag bdun gyis 'bros par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:441b-4: dur khrod du song la rdo rje khro bo'i dkyil 'khor skyang nul gyis byugs pa'i dbus su sa las gzugs byas pa de'i khar dur khrod kyi shing gis me sbar te yungs kar gyi sbyin sreg lan brgya stong byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:441b-5: de ma thag tu dgra 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:441b-6: mar gyi do zhag brgyad la lag na rdo rje'i mdun du k'a ra b'i ra'i me tog dus gsum du brgya rtsa brgyad zhag bdun gyi bar du sbyin sreg byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:441b-8: 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mdun du mchod pa byas te k'a ra b'i ra'i me tog dkar po stong rtsa brgyad phul na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:441b-10: de nas skyes pa dang bud med dbang du bya bar 'dod na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:442a-0: ma da na las gzugs byas te ma da na'i tsher ma bdun gyis gnad rnams su btab la tsha ba gsum gyis snying gar bkang nas zangs kyi thur mas kyang rkang par btsugs la spyi bor phyung ste zhag bdun gyi bar du dus gsum du bzlas brjod byed bzhin du seng ldeng gi me la sreg cing dus gcig kyang lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas pa'i mjug @442a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:442a-1: tu zhag gcig smyung ba byas la mchod pa rgya cher byas te lan brgya stong bzlas brjod byas na skyes pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:442a-3: mar gyi ngo zhag bzhi la zhag gcig smyung ba byas te lag na rdo rje'i mdun du bil ba'i shing gi me sbar la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:442a-4: be kangka ta'i yam sreg shing yungs mar gyi nang du smyugs pa brgya stong gis sbyin sreg byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:442a-5: ti na ra re re thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:442a-6: yugs sa mo dbang du bya bar 'dod na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:442a-7: yar gyi ngo zhag brgyad nas brtsams te zhag gsum gyi bar du dus gsum du zar ma'i me tog brgya rtsa brgyad kyis lag na rdo rje la bsnun na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:442a-9: bu mo dbang du bya bar 'dod na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:442a-10: zhag gsum smyung ba byas te yar gyi ngo tshes bcu gsum la 'dod pa'i lha'i gzugs byas te 'di'i khar 'bras kyi sbyin sreg lan brgya stong byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:442a-12: de nas mdzub mo sgrub par 'dod na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:442a-13: zhag gsum smyung ba byas te mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la dur khrod du song nas ba lang gi lci ba sa la ma lhung bas dkyil 'khor skyang nul gyis byugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:442a-14: dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su mi'i thod pa ma chag ma nyams pa bzhag la tsandan dmar po'i dri chus gtor nas me tog dmar pos mchod la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:442b-0: de nas sgrub pa pos mdzub mos g-yab nas gang gi tshe thod pa 'gul @442b na; de'i tshe 'grub par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:442b-1: gang la mdzub mos bsdigs pa de dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:442b-2: de nas gter dbyung bar 'dod na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:442b-3: me'i sbyin sreg gi thab tu lcags bzhag pa blangs pa las rdo rje byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:442b-4: rdo rje bal nag gi skud pas dkris te mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la zhag gcig smyung nga byas nas lag na rdo rje'i mdun du rdo rje de la lan brgya bzlas brjod byas na de'i tshe 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:442b-5: bsgrubs nas kyang gter gang na yod pa der bzhag pa rdo rje'i gter de blangs te 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:442b-6: de nas khro bo'i bzlas brjod byed bzhin du blang bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:442b-9: de nas gshed byed bslang 'dod na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:442b-10: mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la zhag gcig smyung ba byas te lag na rdo rje'i mdun du dur khrod kyi shing gis me sbar la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:442b-11: ba lang gi shas sbyin sreg byas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:442b-12: ji tsam na me'i thab nas gshed byed 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:442b-13: gang la yid kyis bsam pa de bskyab par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:442b-15: mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la dur khrod du song ste dur khrod kyi shing gis me sbar la sgren mor byung zhing skra bshig ste til dang bsres pa'i yungs kar gyis brgyad brgya sbyin sreg byas na mi nad 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:442b-16: 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mdun du padma'i sbyin sreg lan stong rtsa brgyad byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:443a-2: tshes grangs dang rgyu skar yang 'dam mi 'tshal /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:443a-3: smyung ba yang bya mi dgos par khro bo nyid mchog tu brtam par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:443a-4: dur khrod du song la dur khrod kyi shing gis me sbar sgren mor byung zhing skra bshig ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:443a-5: nim pa'i lo mas bsregs pa'i dur khrod kyi thal pa'i sbyin sreg lan brgya stong byas na mi mang po 'jig par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:443a-7: sna ma'i me tog zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:443a-9: mar gyi nang du smyugs pas lan brgyad brgya sbyin sreg byas na zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:443a-10: rdo rje khro bo bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi cho ga rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:443a-11: de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:443a-13: bdud rtsi thab sbyor gang gis log 'dren rnams kyi gsang ba'i gnas 'di dag bshad pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:443a-16: pha rol gnon pa che lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:443a-17: bdag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la rig sngags rnams kyi dngos grub rnams kyi slad du gang gis rig sngags rnams 'grub pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:443a-18: gang gis mi 'grub pa yongs su zhu bar 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:443a-19: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi tshangs pa chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:443a-21: gang khyod sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir zhugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:443b-1: 'grub par mi 'gyur ba de bzhin gshegs pa la yongs su zhu bar byed pa legs so legs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:443b-3: khyod la rig sngags rnams kyi dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:443b-4: 'grub par mi 'gyur ba'i rgyu bshad par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:443b-5: 'jug par bya ba ma yin pa la 'jug pa gang yin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:443b-6: tshangs pa chen po 'joms pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:443b-7: rig sngags la smod pa gang yin pa de la ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:443b-9: mi bzad pa'i las byed pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:443b-10: sdig pa'i ngang chul can nam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:443b-13: phur bus 'debs pa gang yin pa de la yang rig sngags 'grub par mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:443b-15: byang chub kyi sems yongs su 'dzin pas ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:443b-16: yid kyis kyang lha gzhan la phyag mi bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:443b-21: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang byang chub kyi sems yongs su 'dzin pas lha gzhan la phyag byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:443b-22: byang chub kyi sems yongs su 'dzin pa med pa'i phyir de la lha de ma dad pa'i phyir te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:443b-23: de'i phyir des kyang rig sngags 'grub par mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:443b-24: dud 'gror skyes pa rnams la 'jug par byed pa gang yin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:443b-26: khas rtsva gcod par byed pa gang yin pa de la yang rig sngags 'grub par mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:444a-0: padma dang khyu mchog la rkang pas reg par @444a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:444a-1: byed pa de la yang rig sngags 'grub par mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:444a-2: tshangs pa; gang gis rig sngags 'grub par mi 'gyur ba ngas mdor bstan pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:444a-3: de nas mi mdzed kyi bdag pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:444a-5: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams de ltar sems can dag bde blag tu 'grub par bgyi ba'i gnas rnams ston pa thugs rje che ba lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:444a-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:444a-8: gang dag la rig sngags kyi dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur ba'i phyogs 'ga' tsam zhig khyod la bstan par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:444a-11: dge 'dun la dga' ba gang yin pa dag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:444a-12: dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa gang yin pa dag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:444a-14: ma la gus pa gang yin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:444a-15: rig sngags la mchod pa byed cing rig sngags la bkur sti byed pa gang yin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:444a-16: gsang sngags 'dzin par byed pa gang yin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:444a-17: 'byung po'i zas ngan pa dang til sbrus pa mi za ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:444a-18: sems can thams cad la legs par lta ba gang yin pa de la ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:444b-0: de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dga' zhing mgu la yid rangs te rab tu dga' nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs te bcom @444b ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:444b-2: bdag gis kyang lag na rdo rje'i tshe ga rgyas pa la gang gis rig sngags 'chang rnams srung ba'i gsang sngags dbul bar 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:444b-5: gang khyod kyis sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir bsam pa shod cig shod cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:444b-6: khyod la de bzhin gshegs pas gnang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:444b-7: de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas lag na rdo rje la gsang sngags phul ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:444b-8: na mo ratna tra ya sya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:444b-9: na ma shtsanda badzra pa ni sya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:444b-10: mah'a yaksha se n'a pa ti sya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:444b-13: aa ti ni tsa aa se bhi sha ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:444b-14: mi med tsa mye dan tsa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:444b-17: rig sngags 'di dran pa tsam gyis log 'dren rnams las thar par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:444b-20: lan bdun bzlas brjod byed pa'i skud pas bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:444b-23: lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas pa'i chus bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:444b-29: gu gul gyis bdug pa'am chus bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:444b-32: mthe bos bya'o; ;gdon 'khor du gzhug pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:444b-33: mdzub mo la bzlas brjod byas te bsdig par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:444b-34: skyes pa dang bud med dbang du bya na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:445a-0: yar gyi ngo tshes gcig la brtsams te zhag bdun @445a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:445a-1: gyi bar du dus gsum du sna ma'i me tog stong rtsa brgyad kyis lag na rdo rje la bsnun na dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:445a-2: bum pa la lan brgyad brgyar bsngags te bdag nyid khrus byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:445a-3: log 'dren thams cad kyis gtong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:445a-4: rig sngags sgrub pa'i tshe bgegs zhi bar bya na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:445a-5: lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pa'i thal ba gtsang mas bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:445a-7: rig sngags 'chang gang gis nub mo'i rig sngags sgrub pa de nyid kyi nub mo lag na rdo rje'i mdun du be kam ka ta'i yam sreg shing brgyad brgyas sbyin sreg byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:445a-8: pha rol la bgegs 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:445a-9: 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i bdun du rig sngags lan brgyad brgya bzlas brjod byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:445a-10: rmi lam du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:445a-12: lag na rdo rje'i mdun du zhag bdun gyi bar du dus gsum du lha la phul ba'i me tog brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:445a-14: mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad na zhag gcig smyung ba byas te lag na rdo rje'i mdun du aa shvattha'i shing gis me sbar nas yungs kar khrag gis bsgos pas lan stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:445b-0: de ma thag tu rims kyis 'debs par @445b 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:445b-2: zhag bdun gyi bar du dus gsum du phub ma'i sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:445b-4: lag na rdo rje'i mdun du til dang thal ba'i sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas na gdon gyi rigs 'jigs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:445b-6: zhim thig le'i lo ma'i sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas na mdongs par 'gyur ro; ;yungs kar khyor gang btags te 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mdun du lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:445b-7: slar shags 'gyed pa la lan thebs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:445b-9: yar gyi ngo zla ba nya la zhag gcig smyung ba byas te lag na rdo rje'i mdun du nim pa'i shing gis me sbar nas til gyi sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:445b-10: ti na ra re thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:445b-11: de nas mdzub mo sgrub par 'dod na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:445b-12: mar gyi ngo zhag gcig smyung ba byas te khang stong ngam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:445b-13: dben pa'i phyogs su bud med kyi mo mtshan du mdzub mo btsugs te rig sngags stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas na 'grub par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:445b-14: de nas gang la mdzub mos bsdigs pa de dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:445b-15: gos 'dod na yang yar gyi ngo tshes brgyad la zhag gcig smyung ba byas te lte ba nub tsam du chu'i nang du zhugs la k'a ra b'i ra ka'i me tog brgyad brgya phul na gos phrugs re re thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:446a-0: @446a *// klu mchod pas tshes lnga la zhag gcig smyung ba byas te grog mkhar gyi steng du song la der 'dug nas rig sngags stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:446a-1: de nas sbrul mthong ba de la che ge mo zhig gi thad du song la zo zhig zhes smros shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:446a-5: gzhan sus kyang gso mi nus so; ;tshangs pa'i cho ga rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:446a-6: de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:446a-8: bdag cag gis kyang rig pa'i mchog sgrub pa la dngos grub stsal bar 'tshal te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:446a-9: bgegs gzhil ba'i gsang sngags kyang bshad par 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:446a-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:446a-12: sems can rnams kyi don kyi phyir khyed kyis shod cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:446a-13: de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:446a-14: lag na rdo rje'i zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas tshig mthun par gsang sngags bshad pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:446a-15: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:446a-16: na mashtsanda badzra p'a na ye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:446a-17: mah'a yaksha se n'a pa ta ye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:446a-20: aa ti au gr'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:446a-21: au gra bi y'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:446a-22: aa ti au gra bi y'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:446a-23: au gra kro dha n'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:446a-24: aa ti au gra kro dha n'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:446b-0: tsanda ro sha na @446b ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:446b-1: ro sha pra ma n'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:446b-2: pra ha ra na badzra pra ha ra ni sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:446b-3: aatte matte ma ti ni ha se sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:446b-5: 'di dran pa tsam gyis gdon thams cad 'byer bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:446b-10: gnod sbyin thams cad 'byer bar byed de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:446b-12: de nas rig sngags 'di'i las rnams 'byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:446b-14: zhim thig le'i lo mas bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:446b-15: gdon thams cad mnye bar bya na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:446b-17: gdon gyis zin pa la ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:446b-18: lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pa'i gtun shing gis bsdig par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:446b-20: dur khrod kyi sol ba la gzugs byas te mtshon rnon pos bcad na gdon cho nges 'debs shing 'bros par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:446b-21: gdon gyi mdun du lan tshva dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:446b-22: ske tshes sbyin sreg lan brgyad brgya byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:446b-23: gdon gyi lus tsha bas 'debs par 'debs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:446b-24: ba lang gi lci ba las gdon gyi gzugs byas te lcags kyi thur mas mig tu btsugs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:446b-26: gdon gyi mdun du phub ma'i sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:446b-27: gdon gyi rigs brlag par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:446b-28: gdon gyi mdun du na le sham gyi sreg lugs nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:447a-1: pa gdon gyis zin pa la ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-093-003:447a-7: sbrul gyi pags pa brjes pa rnams kyi bdug pas bdugs na de ma thag tu gtong bar 'gyur ro //
